title: What if I don't want videos of my hobby time available to the world?
summary:
This blog post explores the author's discomfort with the common practice of Airsoft players filming and uploading videos of games to YouTube without explicit consent from other participants. While the author enjoys the hobby and acknowledges the effort players put into their videos, they are uneasy about being potentially filmed and published online without prior agreement.

The author notes the lack of "opt-out" systems, like lanyards, used at conferences to indicate a desire to avoid being filmed. They are hesitant to individually ask every player with a camera not to include them in videos, fearing it might be seen as disruptive to the hobby's culture. The post directly challenges the idea that being in public implies automatic consent to being filmed and published, arguing this is even more pertinent in a private activity on private land.

The author emphasizes they are simply sharing their thoughts and not trying to force changes, acknowledging that filming is part of the fun for some. They clarify that their concern isn't necessarily about legality but about personal privacy preferences and the idea that just because one can publish something, doesn't mean they should. The post concludes by referencing other articles on similar themes, such as privacy implications of CCTV, GPS logging, and online speech-to-text transcription.
chinese_title: 如果我不想让全世界都能看到我业余时间的视频怎么办？
chinese_summary:
这篇博文探讨了作者对于气枪玩家在未经其他参与者明确同意的情况下，拍摄并将游戏视频上传至YouTube这种普遍做法的不安。虽然作者享受这项爱好，并认可玩家为视频付出的努力，但他们对于可能在未经事先同意的情况下被拍摄并发布到网上感到不安。

作者指出，像会议上用于表明不希望被拍摄的挂绳之类的“退出”机制的缺失。他们犹豫是否要单独要求每个带摄像头的玩家不要将自己纳入视频中，因为担心这可能会被视为对该爱好文化的干扰。该帖子直接挑战了“身处公共场所就意味着自动同意被拍摄和发布”的观点，并认为这在私人土地上的私人活动中更为重要。

作者强调他们只是分享自己的想法，并非试图强迫改变，并承认拍摄是某些人乐趣的一部分。他们澄清说，他们的担忧不一定是关于合法性的，而是关于个人隐私偏好以及仅仅因为可以发布某些东西，并不意味着他们就应该这样做。文章最后引用了其他关于类似主题的文章，例如闭路电视、GPS日志记录和在线语音转录的隐私影响。

title: Claude Sonnet 4.5
summary:
Anthropic has released Claude Sonnet 4.5, a new AI model touted as the world's best coding model, excelling in complex agent building, computer usage, reasoning, and math. It's available immediately via the Claude API at the same price as Sonnet 4. Key improvements include enhanced focus on long tasks, state-of-the-art performance on coding benchmarks like SWE-bench Verified (77.2%), and leadership in computer usage on OSWorld (61.4%).

The release includes significant upgrades to Anthropic's products: Claude Code now features checkpoints, a refreshed terminal interface, and a VS Code extension. The Claude API gets context editing and a memory tool for increased complexity. Claude apps now enable code execution and file creation within conversations. A Chrome extension is available to Max users.

Anthropic is also providing developers with the Claude Agent SDK, the same infrastructure used to build Claude Code, enabling them to create their own agents for a variety of tasks.

Sonnet 4.5 is the most aligned frontier model to date, exhibiting improvements in safety and reduced concerning behaviors. It's released under AI Safety Level 3 (ASL-3) protections.

A temporary research preview called "Imagine with Claude," allowing real-time software generation, is available to Max subscribers.

Customers across finance, law, medicine, and STEM sectors have reported significant improvements in domain-specific knowledge and reasoning. Several partners noted improvements in code comprehension, debugging, vulnerability detection, and overall development velocity.
chinese_title: 克劳德十四行诗 4.5
chinese_summary:
Anthropic 发布 Claude Sonnet 4.5，一款号称全球最佳的编码模型，擅长复杂的 Agent 构建、计算机使用、推理和数学。它已通过 Claude API 立即提供，价格与 Sonnet 4 相同。主要改进包括增强了对长任务的关注，在 SWE-bench Verified (77.2%) 等编码基准测试中表现出最先进的性能，并在 OSWorld (61.4%) 上处于计算机使用领域的领先地位。

此次发布包括对 Anthropic 产品的重大升级：Claude Code 现在具有检查点、刷新的终端界面和 VS Code 扩展。Claude API 获得了上下文编辑和记忆工具，以提高复杂性。Claude 应用现在可以在对话中执行代码和创建文件。Max 用户可以使用 Chrome 扩展程序。

Anthropic 还向开发者提供 Claude Agent SDK，该 SDK 与用于构建 Claude Code 的基础设施相同，使他们能够为各种任务创建自己的 Agent。

Sonnet 4.5 是迄今为止最符合对齐的前沿模型，在安全性和减少不良行为方面均有所改进。它在 AI 安全等级 3 (ASL-3) 保护下发布。

一个名为“Imagine with Claude”的临时研究预览版，允许实时软件生成，可供 Max 订阅者使用。

金融、法律、医学和 STEM 领域的客户报告说，在特定领域的知识和推理方面有了显着改进。一些合作伙伴注意到在代码理解、调试、漏洞检测和整体开发速度方面有所提高。

title: Loadmo.re: design inspiration for unconventional web
summary: Loadmo.re is a mobile website gallery showcasing design inspiration for unconventional mobile-first web experiences. Recognizing that digital design practices are still largely desktop-focused, despite the shift to mobile-first interactions, loadmo.re aims to encourage designers to fully embrace the mobile phone's interface and functionalities. The platform hopes to spark conversations within the digital design community about mobile-first design. The website features a curated selection of distinctive websites designed specifically for smartphones. It provides a resource for designers seeking inspiration and aims to highlight innovative approaches to mobile web design. The site also includes links to their Twitter and Instagram pages and an email address for contact. The footer contains copyright information, a cookie notice, and navigation buttons for browsing the gallery. Overall, loadmo.re acts as an archive and source of inspiration, promoting the development of unique and engaging mobile web experiences.
chinese_title: Loadmo.re：非传统网页设计灵感
chinese_summary: Loadmo.re 是一个移动网站画廊，展示非常规的移动优先网络体验的设计灵感。 尽管交互方式已转向移动优先，但数字设计实践仍然主要以桌面为中心，Loadmo.re 旨在鼓励设计师充分利用手机的界面和功能。 该平台希望在数字设计社区内引发关于移动优先设计的讨论。 该网站精选了专为智能手机设计的独特网站，为寻求灵感的设计师提供资源，并旨在突出移动网页设计的创新方法。 该网站还包含指向其 Twitter 和 Instagram 页面的链接以及用于联系的电子邮件地址。 页脚包含版权信息、cookie 通知以及用于浏览画廊的导航按钮。 总的来说，Loadmo.re 作为一个档案和灵感来源，促进了独特且引人入胜的移动网络体验的发展。

title: Not all OCuLink eGPU docks are created equal
summary:
This article details the author's experience trying to use the Minisforum DEG1 eGPU dock with a Raspberry Pi 500+ and various graphics cards, focusing on OCuLink connectivity. The author initially struggled to get the DEG1 dock working, even after resolving power issues and switch configurations. The primary issue seemed to be incompatibility, with the RX 7900 XT not being recognized despite other cards (RX 6500 XT and Intel B580) working with the DEG1.

A key discovery was the variability of OCuLink cables, with the cable included with the DEG1 having additional wires compared to a Chenyang cable. Swapping to the DEG1's cable allowed the RX 6500 XT to function correctly, but the RX 7900 XT remained unrecognized. This led the author to suspect a compatibility issue specifically with the RX 7900 XT and the DEG1 dock, potentially related to PCIe initialization.

Further complicating matters, another commenter experienced the same issues with an RX 7600 on the DEG1. This issue persisted despite trying all switch combinations and swapping cables. The author highlights the frustration caused by these inconsistencies and the difficulty in identifying the root cause, especially given that other users have reported success with the 7900 XT and the DEG1. The author couldn't find a source for the DEG1 OCuLink cable, or a way to know what kind of cable will be included with an online listing.
chinese_title: 并非所有OCuLink eGPU扩展坞都一样。
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者尝试将Minisforum DEG1 eGPU扩展坞与Raspberry Pi 500+和各种显卡配合使用的经历，重点关注OCuLink连接。作者最初难以使DEG1扩展坞正常工作，即使在解决电源问题和开关配置后也是如此。主要问题似乎是不兼容，RX 7900 XT无法识别，尽管其他显卡（RX 6500 XT和Intel B580）可以与DEG1配合使用。

一个关键发现是OCuLink电缆的可变性，DEG1附带的电缆与辰扬电缆相比，具有额外的电线。更换为DEG1的电缆后，RX 6500 XT可以正常工作，但RX 7900 XT仍然无法识别。这导致作者怀疑存在RX 7900 XT和DEG1扩展坞之间的特定兼容性问题，可能与PCIe初始化有关。

更复杂的是，另一位评论者在DEG1上遇到了RX 7600的相同问题。尽管尝试了所有开关组合和更换电缆，但此问题仍然存在。作者强调了这些不一致性造成的挫败感以及识别根本原因的困难，特别是考虑到其他用户报告了7900 XT和DEG1的成功案例。作者找不到DEG1 OCuLink电缆的来源，也无法知道在线列表中将包含哪种电缆。

title: Show HN: Every single torrent is on this website
summary:
infohash.lol is a website that aims to list every possible torrent infohash, of which there are a staggering number. It's inspired by other "every single X" websites. The site leverages the BitTorrent protocol's distributed hash table (DHT) to attempt to find peers advertising themselves for each infohash. When a page of infohashes is loaded, the site queries the DHT for each one. If peers are found, it requests metadata about the torrent, like its name and file list.

The site acknowledges that the chance of finding active torrents randomly is low, and explains why many torrents only show a single peer but no metadata. This is due to crawlers, indexers, malicious clients, or poorly written bots spamming the DHT with random or sequential infohashes. The author points out suspicious IP address ranges that appear to be doing just that.

The site provides examples of known torrents (Ubuntu and Sintel) and their corresponding infohashes.  It also clarifies that the site only lists torrents discoverable through the DHT, and doesn't include those exclusively using private trackers. The author also links to their other website, Library of Babel, containing every possible book.
chinese_title: 展示：这个网站包含了所有的种子文件
chinese_summary:
infohash.lol 是一个旨在列出所有可能的 torrent 信息哈希值的网站，这些哈希值的数量非常惊人。它受到其他“每一个 X”网站的启发。 该网站利用 BitTorrent 协议的分布式哈希表 (DHT) 尝试查找为每个信息哈希值做广告的节点。 当加载信息哈希页面时，该网站会查询每个哈希值的 DHT。 如果找到节点，它会请求有关 torrent 的元数据，例如其名称和文件列表。

该网站承认随机找到活跃 torrent 的几率很低，并解释了为什么许多 torrent 只显示单个节点但没有元数据。 这是由于爬虫、索引器、恶意客户端或编写不当的机器人使用随机或顺序信息哈希值向 DHT 发送垃圾邮件。 作者指出了似乎正在执行此操作的可疑 IP 地址范围。

该网站提供了已知 torrent（Ubuntu 和 Sintel）及其相应信息哈希值的示例。 它还明确指出，该网站仅列出可通过 DHT 发现的 torrent，不包括那些专门使用私有追踪器的 torrent。 作者还链接到他们的另一个网站“巴别图书馆”，其中包含所有可能的书籍。

title: Subtleties of SQLite Indexes
summary:
This article details the author's journey to optimize SQLite query performance for Scour, a content feed application. The core issue was slow ranking due to a large increase in ingested content. The author initially used numerous single-column indexes, which proved ineffective.

Key takeaways include:

*   **Composite Indexes > Single-Column Indexes:** Fewer, well-designed composite indexes are superior to numerous single-column indexes.

*   **Index Column Order Matters:** Column order in an index impacts performance.  The most selective columns (those that narrow the results the most) should come first.

*   **"Left to Right, No Skipping, Stops at the First Range":** SQLite processes index columns from left to right. It can't skip columns, and stops at the first range condition (`BETWEEN`, `<=`, `>=`).  Therefore, columns using strict equality (`=`, `IN`) should precede range-based columns in the index.

*   **Partial Index Precision:** Partial indexes, which apply to a subset of rows based on conditions, require *exact* matching between the condition in the index creation and the query's `WHERE` clause. Even mathematically equivalent expressions (e.g., `<= 0.9` vs. `<= .9`) are not considered identical.

By reordering columns in composite indexes and creating a precise partial index, the author improved query speed by ~35%. The article emphasizes the importance of understanding how SQLite's query planner utilizes indexes to optimize performance, rather than simply adding indexes indiscriminately. The optimized queries reduce the number of rows scanned, resulting in faster row matching and retrieval.
chinese_title: SQLite 索引的微妙之处
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者为内容feed应用Scour优化SQLite查询性能的过程。核心问题是由于摄入内容大量增加导致排名速度缓慢。作者最初使用了大量的单列索引，但事实证明效果不佳。

主要收获包括：

*   **组合索引 > 单列索引：** 少量设计良好的组合索引优于大量的单列索引。

*   **索引列顺序至关重要：** 索引中列的顺序会影响性能。选择性最高的列（那些最能缩小结果范围的列）应放在最前面。

*   **“从左到右，不可跳过，停止于第一个范围”：** SQLite从左到右处理索引列。它不能跳过列，并且会在第一个范围条件（`BETWEEN`、`<=`、`>=`）处停止。因此，使用严格相等（`=`、`IN`）的列应位于索引中基于范围的列之前。

*   **部分索引精确性：** 部分索引，它根据条件应用于行的子集，需要在索引创建中的条件与查询的`WHERE`子句之间进行*精确*匹配。即使是数学上等价的表达式（例如，`<= 0.9`与`<= .9`）也不被认为是相同的。

通过对组合索引中的列进行重新排序并创建一个精确的部分索引，作者将查询速度提高了约35%。本文强调了理解SQLite的查询计划器如何利用索引来优化性能的重要性，而不是简单地随意添加索引。优化后的查询减少了扫描的行数，从而加快了行匹配和检索速度。

title: Why friction is necessary for growth
summary:
This article argues that friction is essential for growth and that the increasing convenience offered by technology, particularly AI like ChatGPT, poses a threat to creativity and potential. The author contends that while some convenience boosts efficiency, excessive comfort leads to stagnation.

The author uses the example of memorizing phone numbers versus relying on contacts to illustrate how removing friction diminishes our need to apply ourselves, leading to a loss of certain skills. They then extend this argument to creativity, specifically writing, highlighting that using ChatGPT for tasks like essay writing prevents the learning and growth that comes from overcoming challenges and making mistakes.

The core idea is that humans naturally seek the path of least resistance, and widespread access to technologies like ChatGPT makes it difficult to choose growth over convenience. To combat this, the author advises deliberately introducing friction back into the process.

However, the article doesn't advocate for complete abstinence from technology. Instead, it suggests learning to use new tools like ChatGPT in a way that aids, rather than hinders, personal growth and development. The author stresses the importance of being mindful of the long-term consequences of relying too heavily on convenience, particularly in the context of creativity and skill development. The article essentially calls for a conscious effort to prioritize personal growth over comfort in an age of increasing technological convenience.
chinese_title: 摩擦为何对成长至关重要
chinese_summary:
本文认为摩擦对于成长至关重要，而技术（尤其是像ChatGPT这样的人工智能）所提供的日益增长的便利性，对创造力和潜力构成了威胁。作者认为，虽然一些便利性能提高效率，但过度舒适会导致停滞。

作者用记忆电话号码与依赖联系人为例，来说明消除摩擦会如何减少我们努力的需求，从而导致某些技能的丧失。然后，他们将这一论点扩展到创造力，特别是写作，强调使用ChatGPT进行诸如论文写作之类的任务会妨碍通过克服挑战和犯错而获得的学习和成长。

核心思想是，人类天生追求阻力最小的道路，而广泛使用像ChatGPT这样的技术使得人们难以选择成长而非便利。为了对抗这一点，作者建议有意识地将摩擦重新引入到过程中。

然而，本文并非主张完全弃用技术。相反，它建议学习以一种有助于而非阻碍个人成长和发展的方式来使用像ChatGPT这样的新工具。作者强调要重视过度依赖便利性的长期后果，尤其是在创造力和技能发展方面。本文本质上呼吁，在技术便利性日益提高的时代，有意识地优先考虑个人成长而非舒适。

title: Map of Near and Middle East Oil 1965
summary:
This article analyzes a "Map of Near and Middle East Oil 1965" published by B. Orchard Lisle, focusing on the various networks depicted and their significance. The map illustrates the Middle East's oil industry as a vast, interconnected system, both physically and economically.

The analysis identifies five key network types: oil and gas pipeline networks connecting oilfields to export terminals and refineries, oilfield and refinery networks showing production hubs and processing locations, concession and ownership networks highlighting the companies (mostly Western at the time) controlling specific areas through concessions and contracts, maritime and shipping networks depicting tanker terminals and implied shipping routes, and regional and international networks illustrating transnational connections and detailed insets of crucial nodes like Kuwait and Dhahran.

The map highlights the integrated nature of the Middle East's oil infrastructure, emphasizing its function as a unified system rather than isolated sites. It demonstrates the interwoven political and economic relationships that shaped the industry in the mid-20th century, showcasing the influence of multinational companies and hinting at future shifts like nationalization and the rise of OPEC. The map serves as a visual representation of the strategic importance and international complexities tied to Middle Eastern oil in 1965.
chinese_title: 1965年中近东石油地图
chinese_summary:
本文分析了B. Orchard Lisle发布的“1965年中近东石油地图”，重点关注其中描绘的各种网络及其重要性。该地图展示了中东石油工业作为一个巨大的、相互关联的系统，无论是在物理层面还是经济层面。

分析确定了五个关键的网络类型：连接油田到出口码头和炼油厂的石油和天然气管道网络、展示生产枢纽和加工地点的油田和炼油厂网络、突出显示通过特许权和合同控制特定区域的公司（当时主要是西方公司）的特许权和所有权网络、描绘油轮码头和隐含航运路线的海运和航运网络，以及展示跨国连接和科威特、达兰等关键节点详细插图的区域和国际网络。

该地图突出了中东石油基础设施的整合性质，强调其作为一个统一系统的功能，而不是孤立的地点。它展示了塑造20世纪中期该行业的相互交织的政治和经济关系，展示了跨国公司的影响力，并暗示了未来如国有化和欧佩克崛起等转变。该地图是1965年中东石油战略重要性和国际复杂性的视觉呈现。

title: Users only care about 20% of your application
summary:
This article argues that users typically only utilize a small fraction (around 20%) of a software application's features, but that each user's preferred 20% is different. This can lead to frustration when updates introduce bloat and disrupt existing workflows. The author uses the example of Microsoft Office, particularly Excel, and Google Search to illustrate this point.

The article highlights that dissatisfaction with mainstream software among "power users" creates opportunities for disruptive companies. Companies like Kagi (a search engine), Figma, and Notion have succeeded by focusing on serving a specific niche of users whose needs are not being met by larger, more general-purpose applications. They focus on perfecting the 20% that the larger players are ignoring.

The author advocates for a development philosophy that embraces customization and modularity. VS Code, Slack, and Discord are cited as examples of platforms that allow users to tailor their experience and enhance their personal 20% through extensions, integrations, and bots. The key takeaway is that instead of trying to make every feature appeal to everyone, developers should focus on making each feature work exceptionally well for the users who truly need it. By accepting that users will ignore most of a software's features, developers can build products that users truly love.
chinese_title: 用户只关心你应用中的20%功能。
chinese_summary:
本文认为，用户通常只使用软件应用的一小部分功能（约20%），但每个用户偏好的20%却各不相同。当更新引入臃肿并扰乱现有工作流程时，这可能会导致不满。作者使用Microsoft Office（特别是Excel）和Google搜索作为例子来说明这一点。

文章强调，主流软件在“高级用户”中的不满情绪为颠覆性公司创造了机会。Kagi（搜索引擎）、Figma和Notion等公司通过专注于服务于特定用户群体而获得了成功，这些用户的需求没有被更大、更通用的应用程序所满足。他们专注于完善大型厂商忽略的20%。

作者提倡一种拥抱定制化和模块化的开发理念。VS Code、Slack和Discord被认为是允许用户通过扩展、集成和机器人定制其体验并增强其个人20%的平台示例。关键在于，开发者不应试图让每个功能都吸引所有人，而应专注于让每个功能对真正需要的用户来说都异常出色。通过接受用户会忽略软件的大部分功能，开发者可以构建出用户真正喜爱的产品。

title: Meta-analysis of 2.2M people: Loneliness increases mortality risk by 32%
summary:
This article highlights the significant health risks associated with loneliness, comparing its impact to smoking and obesity. A meta-analysis of 2.2 million individuals reveals that chronic loneliness increases mortality risk by 32% and dementia risk by 31%, triggering biological changes like inflammation, immune dysfunction, and epigenetic aging. These changes can affect the cardiovascular, metabolic, and neurodegenerative disease processes.

However, the author emphasizes that loneliness is treatable with evidence-based interventions. Studies show that cognitive behavioral therapy, multi-component programs (combining social skills training, cognitive restructuring, social support, and behavioral activation), and mindfulness practices can significantly reduce loneliness. For example, a Barcelona community program saw a 48.3% reduction in loneliness among participants, and a 14-day mindfulness program reduced loneliness by 22%. Animal-assisted interventions have also shown promise.

The author argues that society treats loneliness as a personal weakness rather than a serious health crisis. She advocates for a shift in perspective, emphasizing that simple interventions like mindfulness, volunteering, or acceptance of feelings of loneliness can make a significant difference. The UK's practice of prescribing social activities demonstrates the potential for saving lives and healthcare costs simultaneously. The core message is that loneliness is a serious health threat, but effective solutions exist, and it should be addressed with the same urgency as other major health concerns.
chinese_title: 对220万人进行的荟萃分析：孤独感增加32%的死亡风险
chinese_summary:
本文强调了孤独相关的显著健康风险，将其影响与吸烟和肥胖相提并论。一项对220万人的荟萃分析表明，长期孤独会使死亡风险增加32%，痴呆风险增加31%，并引发炎症、免疫功能障碍和表观遗传衰老等生物学变化。这些变化会影响心血管、代谢和神经退行性疾病的进程。

然而，作者强调孤独是可以治疗的，且有循证干预措施。研究表明，认知行为疗法、多组分项目（结合社交技能训练、认知重建、社会支持和行为激活）以及正念练习可以显著减轻孤独感。例如，巴塞罗那社区项目参与者的孤独感降低了48.3%，为期14天的正念项目使孤独感降低了22%。动物辅助干预也显示出前景。

作者认为，社会将孤独视为个人弱点而非严重的健康危机。她倡导转变观念，强调诸如正念、志愿活动或接受孤独感等简单干预措施可以产生显著影响。英国开具社交活动处方的做法表明了同时拯救生命和降低医疗保健成本的潜力。核心信息是孤独是一种严重的健康威胁，但存在有效的解决方案，应像对待其他重大健康问题一样紧急处理。

title: Optimizing a 6502 image decoder, from 70 minutes to 1 minute
summary:
This article details the author's journey of optimizing a Quicktake 150 image decoder for the 6502 processor on an Apple II, reducing decoding time from 70 minutes to under one minute. The initial decoder, based on the dcraw project, was slow due to the format's Huffman coding, variable-length codes (bit-shifting), and 16-bit math, all inefficient on a 6502.

The optimization process involved several stages:

1.  **Dropping Color:** Decoding only the green pixels as color was irrelevant for the intended monochrome output, reducing instruction count significantly.
2.  **Buffer Optimization:** Understanding and eliminating unnecessary temporary buffers and intermediary loops to minimize memory operations.
3.  **Division Precomputation:** Replacing costly runtime divisions with precomputed division tables, trading slight precision loss for massive speed gains.
4.  **Output Indexing:** Switching to line-by-line indexing for the output buffer, bypassing slow multiplication operations.
5.  **Huffman Decoding:** Reworking the Huffman decoding algorithm to fetch bits one at a time, improving performance on the 6502 despite a slowdown on x86\_64.

Finally, the author hand-optimized the algorithm into assembly, implementing tricks such as specialized division tables for common divisors, faster multiplication replacements, lookup tables for bit shifting, discarder functions for unused color channels, and self-modifying code for buffer access.
chinese_title: 将6502图像解码器优化至1分钟，原耗时70分钟
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者优化Apple II上6502处理器Quicktake 150图像解码器的过程，将解码时间从70分钟缩短到1分钟以内。 最初的解码器基于dcraw项目，由于该格式的霍夫曼编码、变长代码（位移）和16位数学运算，在6502上效率低下而速度缓慢。

优化过程包括几个阶段：

1.  **舍弃颜色：** 仅解码绿色像素，因为颜色对于预期的单色输出无关紧要，从而显着减少了指令数量。
2.  **缓冲区优化：** 理解并消除不必要的临时缓冲区和中间循环，以最大限度地减少内存操作。
3.  **除法预计算：** 用预计算的除法表替换昂贵的运行时除法，以略微的精度损失换取巨大的速度提升。
4.  **输出索引：** 切换到输出缓冲区的逐行索引，绕过缓慢的乘法运算。
5.  **霍夫曼解码：** 重新设计霍夫曼解码算法，一次提取一位，从而提高了在6502上的性能，尽管在x86\_64上速度有所下降。

最后，作者手工将算法优化为汇编代码，实现了诸如常用除数的专用除法表、更快的乘法替换、位移的查找表、未使用颜色通道的丢弃函数以及用于缓冲区访问的自修改代码等技巧。

title: Marissa Mayer will close her old AI startup, sell assets to her new AI startup
summary:
Marissa Mayer, former Yahoo CEO, is shutting down her consumer software startup, Sunshine, and selling its assets to her new AI venture, Dazzle. Wired first reported the news, citing an email to Sunshine's shareholders. Dazzle is reportedly developing an AI personal assistant.

All of Sunshine's employees will transition to Dazzle, and almost all of Sunshine’s investors, including Norwest Venture Partners, Felicis Partners, and SV Angel, have approved the deal.

Sunshine, founded in 2018, initially launched with a contact management app, "Sunshine Contacts," which struggled due to privacy concerns. Later additions of event management and photo sharing with AI integration also failed to gain traction, with both apps garnering just over 1,000 downloads on the Google Play Store. Sunshine had raised approximately $20 million in 2020, with Mayer being a significant self-funder.
chinese_title: 玛丽莎·梅耶尔将关闭她的旧人工智能初创公司，并将资产出售给她的新人工智能初创公司。
chinese_summary:
雅虎前CEO玛丽莎·梅耶尔将关闭其消费者软件初创公司Sunshine，并将其资产出售给她的新AI企业Dazzle。Wired率先报道了这一消息，并引用了一封发给Sunshine股东的邮件。据报道，Dazzle正在开发一款AI个人助理。

Sunshine的所有员工将过渡到Dazzle，几乎所有Sunshine的投资者，包括Norwest Venture Partners、Felicis Partners和SV Angel，都已批准该交易。

Sunshine成立于2018年，最初推出了一款联系人管理应用程序“Sunshine Contacts”，但因隐私问题而举步维艰。后来增加的事件管理和AI集成照片分享功能也未能获得关注，这两款应用程序在Google Play商店的下载量都仅略高于1000次。Sunshine在2020年筹集了约2000万美元，梅耶尔本人是重要的自筹资金者。

title: Sandboxing AI Agents at the Kernel Level
summary:
Abhinav's article highlights the dangers of granting AI agents unfettered filesystem access, particularly when hosted on cloud machines. Even with application-level safeguards, clever attackers can potentially trick agents into leaking sensitive information through file access. The article advocates for kernel-level sandboxing as a more robust solution.

The core of the argument revolves around the `open` syscall in Linux, the fundamental operation for file access. The article breaks down how the `open` syscall can fail at three stages: `do_open` (permission issues), `link_path_walk` (mount point redirections), and `path_init` (root directory setting). Each failure mode reveals a method for concealing files, culminating in the techniques used in containerization.

The article explains how `chmod` and permission bits are the simplest way to hide a file. Next, mount masking allows redirection, making files unreachable in the normal path. Finally, changing the root directory with `chroot` restricts the accessible filesystem. The most effective solution involves combining mount namespaces (isolating mount points) with root directory changes, creating a completely isolated filesystem view for the agent.

This combination is the foundation of containerization technologies like Docker and Podman. By using containers, an agent's access can be restricted at the kernel level, ensuring that it can only "see" and interact with approved files and directories. Greptile, for example, uses rootless Podman containers to guarantee their AI code review agent only accesses necessary files, mitigating potential security risks.
chinese_title: 在内核级别沙盒化AI代理
chinese_summary:
阿比纳夫的文章强调了授予AI代理不受限制的文件系统访问权限的危险性，尤其是在云主机上托管时。即使有应用程序级别的安全措施，聪明的攻击者也可能诱骗代理通过文件访问泄露敏感信息。该文章提倡使用内核级沙箱作为更强大的解决方案。

该论点的核心围绕Linux中的`open`系统调用，这是文件访问的基本操作。该文章分析了`open`系统调用可能在三个阶段失败：`do_open`（权限问题）、`link_path_walk`（挂载点重定向）和`path_init`（根目录设置）。每种失败模式都揭示了一种隐藏文件的方法，最终达到容器化中使用的技术。

该文章解释了`chmod`和权限位是隐藏文件最简单的方法。接下来，挂载掩码允许重定向，使文件在正常路径中无法访问。最后，使用`chroot`更改根目录会限制可访问的文件系统。最有效的解决方案是将挂载命名空间（隔离挂载点）与根目录更改相结合，为代理创建一个完全隔离的文件系统视图。

这种组合是Docker和Podman等容器化技术的基础。通过使用容器，可以在内核级别限制代理的访问权限，确保它只能“看到”并与批准的文件和目录交互。例如，Greptile使用无根Podman容器来保证他们的AI代码审查代理仅访问必要的文件，从而减轻潜在的安全风险。

title: What is "good taste" in software engineering?
summary:
This article explores the concept of "good taste" in software engineering, differentiating it from technical skill. Good taste is presented as the ability to adopt the engineering values that best fit a project's specific context.

The author argues that disagreements among engineers often stem from differing value systems (e.g., prioritizing speed vs. readability) rather than one being objectively "right." Mature engineers understand that most decisions involve trade-offs between competing values. Engineering taste is composed of the set of engineering values an individual finds most important.

Bad taste arises when an engineer inflexibly applies their preferred values to a project where they are unsuitable, often evangelizing solutions that worked elsewhere without considering the current context. Good taste, conversely, is the ability to select the *right* set of engineering values for the problem at hand, leading to project success.

Developing good taste involves working on diverse projects, observing which aspects are easy or difficult, and cultivating flexibility rather than holding strong universal opinions. Identifying good taste is challenging because it requires observing performance in real-world problems, not just hypothetical scenarios. The author emphasizes the importance of adapting values to the project's unique needs, cautioning against rigid adherence to "best practices."
chinese_title: 软件工程中，什么是“好品味”？
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了软件工程中“良好品味”的概念，将其与技术技能区分开来。“良好品味”被定义为采纳最适合项目特定情境的工程价值观的能力。

作者认为，工程师之间的分歧往往源于不同的价值体系（例如，优先考虑速度还是可读性），而不是一方客观上“正确”。成熟的工程师明白，大多数决策都涉及竞争价值之间的权衡。工程品味由个人认为最重要的工程价值观组成。

当工程师不灵活地将自己偏好的价值观应用于不适合的项目时，就会出现不良品味，他们经常宣扬在其他地方有效的解决方案，而不考虑当前的背景。相反，良好的品味是为手头的问题选择*正确*的工程价值观集的能力，从而带来项目的成功。

培养良好的品味需要参与不同的项目，观察哪些方面容易或困难，并培养灵活性，而不是持有强烈的普遍观点。识别良好的品味具有挑战性，因为它需要在现实问题中观察性能，而不仅仅是假设场景。作者强调了根据项目独特需求调整价值观的重要性，并警告不要死守“最佳实践”。

title: Claude Code 2.0

chinese_title: 克劳德代码 2.0

title: Write the Damn Code
summary:
The article "Write the Damn Code" argues against relying solely on iterative prompt refinement when using AI for coding tasks. The author suggests a more hands-on approach, advocating for software engineers to actively participate in the coding process rather than trying to "program in English."

The core message is to use AI as a tool to augment, not replace, coding skills. Instead of spending excessive time perfecting prompts, the author proposes strategies like:

*   Asking AI for a first draft and then refactoring it.
*   Writing initial code and seeking AI review and improvement.
*   Coding critical sections and delegating the rest to AI.
*   Creating an outline and asking AI to fill in the blanks.

The author emphasizes that direct involvement with the code leads to better results than relying on AI to produce perfect code from prompts alone. While acknowledging the value of AI in coding, the piece serves as a reminder for software engineers to leverage their own coding abilities and avoid becoming mere "prompt refiners" in the AI era. The key takeaway is to strike a balance between utilizing AI tools and actively writing and shaping the code yourself.
chinese_title: 写他妈的代码
chinese_summary:
文章《写该死的代码》反对在使用人工智能进行编码任务时仅依赖于迭代式的提示词优化。作者建议采取更积极主动的方式，提倡软件工程师积极参与编码过程，而不是试图“用英语编程”。

核心信息是将人工智能作为一种工具来增强而非取代编码技能。作者没有把过多时间花在完善提示词上，而是提出了以下策略：

*   让AI生成初稿，然后进行重构。
*   编写初始代码，并寻求AI的审查和改进。
*   编写关键部分的代码，并将其余部分委托给AI。
*   创建大纲，并让AI填充空白。

作者强调，直接参与代码编写比仅仅依靠AI从提示词中生成完美代码能带来更好的结果。虽然承认AI在编码方面的价值，但这篇文章提醒软件工程师要利用自己的编码能力，避免在人工智能时代沦为单纯的“提示词优化师”。 主要的结论是在利用AI工具和主动编写和塑造代码之间取得平衡。

title: F-Droid and Google’s developer registration decree
summary:
This article argues against Google's new requirement for Android developers to register with Google, including paying a fee, agreeing to terms, and providing personal identification to distribute apps. The article claims this move jeopardizes the F-Droid project, an open-source app repository offering a safe, transparent alternative to commercial app stores, particularly Google Play. F-Droid validates apps for user interests, ensuring they are open source and free from unwanted features like trackers or ads.

The article contends that Google's registration decree would effectively end F-Droid because it can't force developers to register or take over app identifiers, undermining the trust and verification that define F-Droid.

The author refutes Google's claim that registration is necessary for security, pointing out that Google Play has hosted malware and that F-Droid's transparency and open-source nature provide a stronger basis for trust. They suggest Google already has mechanisms like Play Protect to address malware concerns and that the registration is more about consolidating power and control.

The article defends the right to run any software on owned devices, comparing the registration requirement to restricting free speech and creative expression. It urges regulatory bodies to examine Google's actions, protect alternative app stores, and support developers unwilling to comply with the requirements. The author encourages developers and users to contact representatives and advocate for software freedom and open distribution.
chinese_title: F-Droid与谷歌开发者注册法令
chinese_summary:
本文反对谷歌要求安卓开发者注册才能发布应用的新规定，包括支付费用、同意条款以及提供个人身份信息。文章声称此举危及 F-Droid 项目，这是一个开源应用商店，为商业应用商店（尤其是 Google Play）提供安全透明的替代方案。F-Droid 验证应用以满足用户利益，确保它们是开源的，并且没有跟踪器或广告等不需要的功能。

文章认为，谷歌的注册法令实际上会扼杀 F-Droid，因为它无法强迫开发者注册或接管应用标识符，从而破坏了定义 F-Droid 的信任和验证。

作者驳斥了谷歌关于注册对于安全是必要的说法，指出 Google Play 曾托管恶意软件，而 F-Droid 的透明性和开源性质为信任提供了更强大的基础。他们认为谷歌已经拥有像 Play Protect 这样的机制来解决恶意软件问题，而注册更多是为了巩固权力和控制。

文章捍卫了在自有设备上运行任何软件的权利，将注册要求比作限制言论自由和创造性表达。它敦促监管机构审查谷歌的行为，保护替代应用商店，并支持不愿遵守要求的开发者。作者鼓励开发者和用户联系代表，倡导软件自由和开放分发。

title: Play snake in the URL address bar
summary:
This article introduces a JavaScript-based game called "URL Snake" where the player controls a snake within the URL address bar of a web browser. The game requires JavaScript to function correctly. Players use arrow keys or the WASD keys for controlling the snake's movement. The goal is presumably to navigate the snake and score points, similar to the classic Snake game.

The article notes that some users might experience issues displaying the URL or that it may appear "messed up," offering a link for assistance. It also displays the user's highest score achieved in the game. Finally, it includes share options and arrow symbols to indicate direction controls. In essence, it's a brief announcement and instruction set for a unique implementation of the Snake game played within a URL.
chinese_title: 在网址栏玩贪吃蛇
chinese_summary:
本文介绍一款基于JavaScript的游戏，名为“URL Snake”，玩家在网页浏览器的URL地址栏中控制一条蛇。该游戏需要JavaScript才能正常运行。玩家使用方向键或WASD键来控制蛇的移动。游戏目标大概是导航蛇并获得分数，类似于经典的贪吃蛇游戏。

文章指出，某些用户可能会遇到URL显示问题或显示“乱码”，并提供了一个链接以寻求帮助。它还显示了用户在游戏中获得的最高分。最后，它包括分享选项和箭头符号以指示方向控制。本质上，这是一个简短的公告和说明，用于在URL中玩贪吃蛇游戏的独特实现。

title: How the Brain Balances Excitation and Inhibition
summary:
This article explores how the brain maintains a healthy balance between excitation and inhibition, processes crucial for proper neurological function. The brain relies on excitatory neurons (primarily using glutamate) that trigger other neurons to fire and inhibitory neurons (using GABA) that suppress firing. An imbalance can lead to neurological conditions like seizures (too much excitation) or autism (too little).

Neuroscientists are investigating how these two categories of cells interact, particularly with a third, rarer category: neuromodulatory neurons. These neurons use neuromodulators like dopamine and serotonin to exert slower, longer-lasting, and more widespread influence on neural activity, impacting the likelihood of excitatory and inhibitory neurons firing.

Recent research is challenging previous assumptions about inhibitory neurons, showing they are more selective in their targets than previously thought, playing a more active role in processes like learning and memory. The article highlights that these intricate interactions between neuron types are essential for complex functions such as thought, memory, and consciousness.

The roles of the three neuron types are not always distinct, with some neurons displaying overlapping functionalities or the ability to switch identities. Ultimately, understanding these complex networks and what happens when they become unbalanced could lead to new treatments for neurological disorders.
chinese_title: 大脑如何平衡兴奋与抑制
chinese_summary:
本文探讨大脑如何维持兴奋和抑制之间的健康平衡，这一过程对于正常的神经功能至关重要。大脑依赖于兴奋性神经元（主要使用谷氨酸）来触发其他神经元放电，以及抑制性神经元（使用GABA）来抑制放电。失衡会导致诸如癫痫（兴奋过多）或自闭症（兴奋不足）等神经系统疾病。

神经科学家正在研究这两类细胞如何相互作用，特别是与第三类更罕见的神经调质神经元。这些神经元使用多巴胺和血清素等神经调质，对神经活动施加更慢、更持久、更广泛的影响，从而影响兴奋性和抑制性神经元放电的可能性。

最近的研究正在挑战之前关于抑制性神经元的假设，表明它们的目标比以前认为的更具选择性，并在学习和记忆等过程中发挥更积极的作用。本文强调，神经元类型之间这些复杂的相互作用对于诸如思想、记忆和意识等复杂功能至关重要。

这三种神经元类型的作用并非总是截然不同，有些神经元表现出重叠的功能或转换身份的能力。最终，理解这些复杂的网络以及它们失衡时会发生什么，可能会为神经系统疾病带来新的治疗方法。

title: FCC Accidentally Leaked iPhone Schematics
summary:
The FCC mistakenly published a 163-page PDF containing electrical schematics for the iPhone 16e, a device released in February. Apple had specifically requested that these schematics be kept confidential, citing proprietary trade secrets that could give competitors an unfair advantage.

The leaked documents include block diagrams, electrical schematics, and antenna locations. While competitors could technically obtain this information by disassembling an iPhone 16e, the leak eliminates any need for reverse engineering. Apple is known for aggressively pursuing patent infringement cases.

Apple's cover letter, dated September 16, 2024, accompanied the schematics and explicitly requested indefinite confidentiality. AppleInsider suggests the leak was likely due to an incorrect database setting and not a deliberate act, particularly given Apple's supportive relationship with the Trump administration, as highlighted by Tim Cook gifting the President a gold trophy. The FCC has yet to comment on the incident or its potential repercussions.
chinese_title: FCC意外泄露iPhone原理图
chinese_summary: FCC 错误发布 iPhone 16e 电路图，苹果要求保密。泄露文件包含框图、电路图和天线位置。苹果曾致函要求永久保密。AppleInsider 认为泄露可能是数据库设置错误导致。FCC 尚未置评。

title: Using Cesium-137 testing to find counterfeit wine
summary:
This article, titled "Atomic Wine," explores the world of counterfeit wine and the lengths experts go to in authenticating valuable bottles. It highlights the story of the "Jefferson Bottles," purportedly owned by Thomas Jefferson, which sparked an investigation into wine fraud.

The article details how wine detective Maureen Downey uses forensic techniques to examine bottles for clues. It also recounts the story of Hardy Rodenstock, suspected of selling counterfeit Jefferson bottles.

A key element of the investigation involved physicist Philippe Hubert's innovative use of Cesium-137 testing. Because Cesium-137 didn't exist before the atomic age, its presence in wine would indicate a post-1945 bottling date. While this method could identify modern forgeries, it couldn't definitively prove the authenticity of pre-atomic era wines. In the case of the Jefferson bottles, no Cesium-137 was detected.

The article further reveals that Bill Koch's investigators discovered the "Th.J." inscription on the Jefferson bottles was made using a modern dental tool, definitively proving them to be fake.

Finally, the article touches on the case of Rudy Kurniawan, a fraudster who created elaborate wine recipes in his kitchen, mixing different wines to mimic rare vintages.
chinese_title: 使用铯-137检测鉴别假酒
chinese_summary:
这篇文章题为《原子葡萄酒》，探讨了假冒葡萄酒的世界以及专家们为鉴定珍贵葡萄酒瓶所采取的种种手段。文章重点讲述了据称由托马斯·杰斐逊拥有的“杰斐逊酒瓶”的故事，该事件引发了对葡萄酒欺诈的调查。

文章详细介绍了葡萄酒侦探莫琳·道尼如何使用法医技术来检查瓶子寻找线索。文章还叙述了哈迪·罗登斯托克的故事，他涉嫌出售假冒的杰斐逊酒瓶。

调查的一个关键要素包括物理学家菲利普·于贝尔创新性地使用铯-137测试。由于铯-137在原子时代之前并不存在，因此在葡萄酒中发现铯-137的存在表明其灌装日期在1945年之后。虽然这种方法可以识别现代伪造品，但它不能明确证明原子时代之前葡萄酒的真伪。在杰斐逊酒瓶的案例中，没有检测到铯-137。

文章进一步揭示，比尔·科赫的调查人员发现杰斐逊酒瓶上的“Th.J.”铭文是用现代牙科工具制作的，这最终证明它们是赝品。

最后，文章还涉及了鲁迪·库尼亚万的案例，他是一名诈骗犯，在他的厨房里创造了精巧的葡萄酒配方，混合不同的葡萄酒来模仿稀有年份的葡萄酒。

title: Thoughts on Mechanical Keyboards and the ZSA Moonlander
summary:
This article is a review of the ZSA Moonlander mechanical keyboard, viewed by the author less as a hobbyist item and more as a tool for ergonomic typing. While acknowledging the vibrant mechanical keyboard community and its focus on aesthetics and sound, the author emphasizes the importance of programmability and customization for minimizing strain and improving workflow.

The Moonlander, with its split design and customizable firmware (QMK), allows for personalized key mappings and layering, enabling the user to adapt the keyboard to their specific needs, crucial in challenging work environments. The author highlights the superiority of this approach over traditional keyboards and the ability to carry personalized settings across different systems.

However, the Moonlander is not without its flaws. The $365 price tag is steep, and the author points out issues with the hand rests' flimsy construction and wobbly design, along with the difficulty of achieving a stable tenting position. Despite these shortcomings, the high-quality key switches, sturdy main body, and the powerful QMK firmware redeem the keyboard to an extent.

The author lauds ZSA's browser-based keyboard designer for its user-friendliness and ease of customization. Despite the reduced number of physical keys compared to a full-sized keyboard, the programmable layers offer significant flexibility. Ultimately, the Moonlander is a good keyboard that could be great with improvements to its ergonomics and build quality. The QMK firmware's value in personalizing the keyboard experience is a major selling point.
chinese_title: 关于机械键盘与ZSA Moonlander的思考
chinese_summary:
本文评测了ZSA Moonlander机械键盘，作者认为它与其说是业余爱好者的玩物，不如说是符合人体工学的打字工具。 虽然承认机械键盘社区充满活力，并专注于美学和声音，但作者强调了可编程性和定制的重要性，以最大限度地减少压力并改善工作流程。

Moonlander采用分离式设计和可定制的固件（QMK），允许个性化的按键映射和分层，使用户能够使键盘适应其特定需求，这在具有挑战性的工作环境中至关重要。 作者强调了这种方法相对于传统键盘的优越性，以及在不同系统之间携带个性化设置的能力。

然而，Moonlander并非没有缺陷。 365美元的价格很高昂，作者指出了手托结构脆弱和设计不稳定的问题，以及难以实现稳定的倾斜角度。 尽管存在这些缺点，但高质量的键轴、坚固的主体和强大的QMK固件在一定程度上弥补了键盘的不足。

作者称赞ZSA基于浏览器的键盘设计器，因为它具有用户友好性和易于定制的特点。 尽管与全尺寸键盘相比，物理按键的数量减少了，但可编程的层提供了极大的灵活性。 最终，Moonlander是一款不错的键盘，如果能改善其人体工程学和制造质量，它可能会变得非常出色。 QMK固件在个性化键盘体验方面的价值是一个主要的卖点。

title: The phaseout of the mmap() file operation in Linux
summary:
This LWN.net article from September 2025 discusses the ongoing effort to phase out the `mmap()` file operation in the Linux kernel, a process that began in kernel 6.17. The `mmap()` method, part of the `file_operations` structure, allows drivers to map file descriptor-backed objects into user-space memory. However, it has significant drawbacks: it's invoked after memory management setup, requiring complex cleanup on failure, and it grants drivers direct access to the VMA (virtual memory area) structure, a critical memory management data structure. This access can lead to bugs and unexpected behavior.

The replacement, starting with kernel 6.17, involves a new `mmap_prepare()` callback and `vm_area_desc` structure. `mmap_prepare()` is called earlier in the mapping process, before the VMA is fully set up, simplifying error handling.  `vm_area_desc` limits driver access to memory management structures, enabling drivers to specify changes like offset adjustments, flag modifications, and page protection adjustments.

Because the initial solution wasn't sufficient for all drivers, a new `mmap_action` structure has been added to `vm_area_desc` to support more complex use cases, like remapping page-frame numbers directly into the VMA. The `mmap_action` includes a `success_hook` and `error_hook` for post-action handling. The article notes that while the new API is under active development, it will still take a while to convert the hundreds of existing `mmap()` implementations. The author, iabervon, notes in the comment section that the `/dev/zero` driver is using `mmap` to generate anonymous pages.
chinese_title: Linux 中 mmap() 文件操作的淘汰
chinese_summary:
这篇2025年9月发表于LWN.net的文章讨论了在Linux内核中逐步淘汰`mmap()`文件操作的持续努力，该过程始于内核6.17。`mmap()`方法是`file_operations`结构的一部分，允许驱动程序将文件描述符支持的对象映射到用户空间内存中。然而，它存在重大缺陷：它在内存管理设置之后被调用，需要在失败时进行复杂的清理，并且它授予驱动程序直接访问VMA（虚拟内存区域）结构，这是一个关键的内存管理数据结构。这种访问可能导致错误和意外行为。

从内核6.17开始的替代方案包括一个新的`mmap_prepare()`回调函数和`vm_area_desc`结构。`mmap_prepare()`在映射过程的早期被调用，在VMA完全设置之前，简化了错误处理。`vm_area_desc`限制了驱动程序对内存管理结构的访问，使驱动程序能够指定更改，例如偏移量调整、标志修改和页面保护调整。

由于最初的解决方案不足以满足所有驱动程序的需求，因此已将一个新的`mmap_action`结构添加到`vm_area_desc`中，以支持更复杂的用例，例如将页帧号直接重新映射到VMA中。`mmap_action`包括一个`success_hook`和一个`error_hook`，用于操作后的处理。文章指出，虽然新的API正在积极开发中，但仍需要一段时间才能转换数百个现有的`mmap()`实现。作者iabervon在评论区指出，`/dev/zero`驱动程序正在使用`mmap`生成匿名页面。

title: Queueing to publish in AI and CS
summary:
This blog post by David Martínez-Rubio and Sebastian Pokutta explores the impact of fixed, low acceptance rates in AI and CS conference publications. The authors use simplified models to analyze the reviewing and acceptance system.

The first, ideal model assumes authors resubmit indefinitely. It shows that reducing the acceptance rate, *p*, doesn't change the number of accepted papers (*N*) but increases the pool size and review load proportionally to *N/p*.

The second, more realistic model considers that authors give up after *T* attempts and categorizes papers into "great," "average," and "bad." Simulations suggest lowering the acceptance rate increases abandoned "bad" papers, but also disproportionately affects "average" papers while significantly increasing review load. For instance, decreasing the acceptance rate from 35% to 20% increases the number of abandoned "bad" papers only slightly but impacts "average" papers far more significantly, all while review load increases substantially.

The authors conclude that a lower acceptance rate, while potentially preventing some "bad" papers, leads to excessive reviewing costs and the unfair rejection of many acceptable papers due to "bad luck." They advocate for exploring alternative solutions like federated conferences to address the issue of conference size and emphasize the importance of considering "effective acceptance rates." They call for community-driven discussions, quick reviewing experiments, mindful resource allocation, and embracing change in the peer-review process.
chinese_title: 在人工智能和计算机科学领域排队发表
chinese_summary:
David Martínez-Rubio 和 Sebastian Pokutta 的这篇博文探讨了人工智能和计算机科学会议出版物中固定低接受率的影响。作者使用简化的模型来分析评审和接受系统。

第一个理想模型假设作者无限期地重新提交。它表明降低接受率 *p* 不会改变被接受的论文数量 (*N*)，但会使提交池规模和审稿负担与 *N/p* 成比例增加。

第二个更现实的模型考虑了作者在 *T* 次尝试后放弃，并将论文分为“优秀”、“一般”和“差”。模拟结果表明，降低接受率会增加被放弃的“差”论文数量，但也会不成比例地影响“一般”论文，同时显著增加审稿负担。例如，将接受率从 35% 降低到 20% 只会略微增加被放弃的“差”论文数量，但对“一般”论文的影响更为显著，同时审稿负担大幅增加。

作者得出结论，降低接受率虽然可能阻止一些“差”论文，但会导致过高的审稿成本，并且由于“坏运气”导致许多可接受的论文被不公平地拒绝。他们提倡探索诸如联邦会议之类的替代解决方案来解决会议规模问题，并强调考虑“有效接受率”的重要性。他们呼吁社区驱动的讨论、快速评审实验、周到的资源分配以及接受同行评审过程中的变革。

title: Zlib visualizer
summary:
The provided content mentions "Zlib visualizer" as the title and "flateview" as the content. This strongly suggests that `flateview` is a tool for visualizing the Zlib compression algorithm, specifically the Deflate algorithm which Zlib often uses.

Given this context, we can infer that `flateview` allows users to understand the inner workings of Zlib/Deflate compression. Likely features include:

*   **Visualization of compression steps:** The tool probably displays how data is transformed through the various stages of Deflate, such as Huffman coding, Lempel-Ziv (LZ77) sliding window compression, and block creation.
*   **Interactive exploration:** Users might be able to step through the compression process, examine the generated Huffman trees, or inspect the LZ77 matches.
*   **Decoding view:** It is likely the tool can also visualize the decompression process, showing how the compressed data is reconstructed into the original data.
*   **Data representation:** Displaying the compressed data in a human-readable format (e.g., hexadecimal or binary) along with annotations explaining the different parts of the compressed stream.
*   **Educational tool:** `flateview` serves as a valuable tool for understanding and learning about lossless data compression techniques. It can aid in debugging compression/decompression issues and optimizing compression parameters.
*   **Potential application:** Reverse engineering and security analysis could also benefit from a tool that visualizes the compression process.

In essence, `flateview` is a Zlib/Deflate visualizer that offers a visual and interactive way to understand the compression and decompression algorithms used by Zlib.
chinese_title: Zlib可视化工具
chinese_summary:
Zlib可视化工具：Flateview

根据提供的内容，“Zlib可视化工具”是标题，“flateview”是内容。这强烈暗示 `flateview` 是一个用于可视化 Zlib 压缩算法的工具，特别是 Zlib 经常使用的 Deflate 算法。

在此背景下，我们可以推断 `flateview` 允许用户理解 Zlib/Deflate 压缩的内部工作原理。可能包含以下功能：

*   **压缩步骤可视化：** 该工具可能展示数据如何通过 Deflate 的各个阶段进行转换，例如 Huffman 编码、Lempel-Ziv (LZ77) 滑动窗口压缩和块创建。
*   **交互式探索：** 用户可能能够逐步执行压缩过程，检查生成的 Huffman 树，或检查 LZ77 匹配。
*   **解码视图：** 该工具很可能还可以可视化解压缩过程，显示压缩数据如何重构为原始数据。
*   **数据表示：** 以人类可读的格式（例如，十六进制或二进制）显示压缩数据，并附带解释压缩流不同部分的注释。
*   **教育工具：** `flateview` 是一个理解和学习无损数据压缩技术的宝贵工具。它可以帮助调试压缩/解压缩问题并优化压缩参数。
*   **潜在应用：** 逆向工程和安全分析也可以从可视化压缩过程的工具中受益。

本质上，`flateview` 是一个 Zlib/Deflate 可视化工具，提供了一种可视化和交互式的方式来理解 Zlib 使用的压缩和解压缩算法。

title: Zero ASIC releases Wildebeest, the highest performance FPGA synthesis tool
summary:
Zero ASIC has released Wildebeest, a high-performance, open-source FPGA synthesis tool designed to bridge the performance gap between open-source and proprietary options. Wildebeest aims to democratize access to high-quality silicon design by providing industrial-level performance in an open-source environment.

Key features of Wildebeest include circuit size-aware algorithm selection, advanced ABC9 commands for optimization, and development guided by an extensive internal benchmark suite, including the public LogikBench. Dr. Thierry Besson, a veteran in logic synthesis, leads the Wildebeest development, incorporating techniques previously exclusive to proprietary tools.

Benchmark results for the picorv32 CPU design demonstrate that Wildebeest's Quality of Results (QoR) surpasses both proprietary and open-source FPGA synthesis solutions in terms of LUT count and logic depth.

Zero ASIC envisions Wildebeest as the foundation for an "LLVM for synthesis," fostering community development of high-performance FPGA tools, standardized intermediate representations (IRs), and broader hardware vendor adoption. The tool's source code is available on GitHub. The release represents the beginning of a journey with a roadmap for continuous improvements aimed at surpassing existing proprietary tools. Zero ASIC, a semiconductor startup based in Cambridge, Massachusetts, focuses on democratizing access to silicon through chiplets and design automation.
chinese_title: Zero ASIC 发布 Wildebeest，性能最高的 FPGA 综合工具
chinese_summary:
Zero ASIC 发布 Wildebeest，一款高性能开源 FPGA 综合工具，旨在弥合开源和专有方案之间的性能差距。 Wildebeest 致力于通过在开源环境中提供工业级性能，普及高质量芯片设计。

Wildebeest 的主要特性包括电路规模感知算法选择、用于优化的高级 ABC9 指令，以及由包括公共 LogikBench 在内的大量内部基准套件指导的开发。 逻辑综合领域的资深人士 Thierry Besson 博士领导 Wildebeest 的开发，整合了以前专属于专有工具的技术。

针对 picorv32 CPU 设计的基准测试结果表明，Wildebeest 的质量指标 (QoR) 在 LUT 数量和逻辑深度方面均超越了专有和开源 FPGA 综合解决方案。

Zero ASIC 设想将 Wildebeest 作为“综合的 LLVM”的基础，从而促进高性能 FPGA 工具、标准化中间表示 (IR) 以及更广泛的硬件供应商采用的社区开发。 该工具的源代码可在 GitHub 上找到。 此次发布标志着一段旅程的开始，其路线图旨在不断改进，从而超越现有的专有工具。 Zero ASIC 是一家位于马萨诸塞州剑桥的半导体初创公司，致力于通过芯片和设计自动化普及芯片的使用。

title: Avalanche Studios NYC Retrospective – An Ambitious Company Ruined
summary:
Malte Skarupke's retrospective details the rise and fall of Avalanche Studios NYC, where he worked for seven and a half years. Founded with ambition to create better games, particularly for the Just Cause franchise, the studio struggled due to poor development practices and ultimately failed.

The studio initially hired senior developers, but Skarupke joined as a junior tools-programmer tasked with maintaining a buggy and outdated level editor. He describes the editor as a mess of tangled code and band-aid fixes, reflecting similar issues in the development of Just Cause 1 and 2.

Just Cause 3 nearly faced cancellation due to Square Enix's financial troubles, temporarily switching to a "free-to-play" model. Skarupke highlights problems encountered using Catmull-Rom splines and road intersections. A large rewrite of both the editor (in Python, deemed a mistake) and terrain system proved disastrous, leading to data corruption, lost work, and performance issues that almost prevented the game's release. The new editor following OOP design principles made it hard to maintain because it was riddled with layers.

Despite these technical challenges, Skarupke fondly remembers the studio's culture, work/life balance, and the vibrant location. However, the fundamental problems with development tools and the decision to tackle a simultaneous major rewrite ultimately contributed to the studio's downfall. He advocates for incremental improvements and avoiding overly ambitious projects when tackling engine rewrites.
chinese_title: 雪崩工作室纽约回顾：一家雄心勃勃的公司是如何陨落的
chinese_summary:
Malte Skarupke的回顾文章详细讲述了雪崩工作室纽约分部（Avalanche Studios NYC）的兴衰，他曾在此工作了七年半。该工作室成立之初雄心勃勃，旨在创造更好的游戏，尤其是“正当防卫”（Just Cause）系列，但由于糟糕的开发实践而举步维艰，最终失败。

工作室最初聘请了资深开发者，而Skarupke则以初级工具程序员的身份加入，负责维护一个充满漏洞且过时的关卡编辑器。他形容该编辑器是一团乱麻的代码和权宜之计的补丁，反映了“正当防卫1”和“正当防卫2”开发中类似的问题。

由于Square Enix的财务困境，“正当防卫3”几乎面临取消，并一度转向“免费游戏”模式。 Skarupke强调了使用Catmull-Rom样条和道路交叉口时遇到的问题。对编辑器（使用Python，被认为是一个错误）和地形系统的大规模重写被证明是灾难性的，导致数据损坏、工作丢失和性能问题，几乎阻碍了游戏的发布。遵循OOP设计原则的新编辑器由于充斥着各层结构而难以维护。

尽管存在这些技术挑战，Skarupke仍然怀念工作室的文化、工作/生活平衡以及充满活力的地理位置。 然而，开发工具的根本问题以及同时进行重大重写的决定最终导致了工作室的倒闭。 他提倡逐步改进，并避免在处理引擎重写时进行过于雄心勃勃的项目。

title: DeepSeek-v3.2-Exp
summary:
DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp, an experimental model from DeepSeek-AI, introduces DeepSeek Sparse Attention (DSA) to improve training and inference efficiency in long-context scenarios. DSA aims for fine-grained sparse attention, leading to significant computational efficiency improvements without sacrificing output quality.

The model's training configuration was aligned with V3.1-Terminus to accurately evaluate the impact of DSA. Benchmarks show that DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp achieves performance comparable to V3.1-Terminus across various reasoning, coding, and agentic tool use tasks.

The release includes open-source kernels for TileLang and CUDA (available in DeepGEMM and FlashMLA) to facilitate research and development. Instructions are provided for running the model locally using Hugging Face, SGLang (with Docker images for H200, MI350, and NPUs), and vLLM.

DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp is licensed under the MIT License.
chinese_title: DeepSeek-v3.2-Exp
chinese_summary:
DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp：DeepSeek-AI的实验性模型，引入DeepSeek稀疏注意力（DSA）以提高长上下文场景中的训练和推理效率。DSA旨在实现细粒度的稀疏注意力，从而在不牺牲输出质量的前提下显著提高计算效率。

该模型的训练配置与V3.1-Terminus对齐，以准确评估DSA的影响。基准测试表明，DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp在各种推理、编码和智能体工具使用任务中实现了与V3.1-Terminus相当的性能。

该版本包括TileLang和CUDA的开源内核（在DeepGEMM和FlashMLA中提供），以促进研究和开发。提供了使用Hugging Face、SGLang（带有H200、MI350和NPU的Docker镜像）和vLLM在本地运行模型的说明。

DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp采用MIT许可证。

title: Go ahead, write the “stupid” code
summary:
This article encourages programmers to embrace writing "stupid" code, emphasizing that it's a crucial part of the learning process and should be a source of enjoyment. The author shares their personal journey, starting with their initial hesitation about programming, eventually falling in love with it through hands-on experience and lots of coding. They highlight the importance of writing code, even if it seems simple or unnecessary, as a way to refine skills and learn new technologies.

The author realized they were holding back from writing simple, experimental projects due to self-criticism developed over years of experience. They advocate for giving oneself grace and permission to write code freely, without the pressure of perfection. They suggest that experimenting with new runtimes, languages, and ideas is a valuable way to grow professionally and personally. The core message is to prioritize the joy of coding, encouraging readers to explore, break things, and nurture their curiosity without being overly critical of the outcome. They emphasize that all code, regardless of its perceived complexity or purpose, contributes to learning and growth.
chinese_title: 尽管放手去写那些“笨”代码吧
chinese_summary:
本文鼓励程序员拥抱编写“愚蠢”代码，强调这是学习过程中至关重要的一部分，并且应该是乐趣的来源。作者分享了他们的个人经历，从最初对编程的犹豫，到最终通过实践和大量的编码而爱上编程。他们强调了编写代码的重要性，即使代码看起来很简单或不必要，这也是一种磨练技能和学习新技术的途径。

作者意识到，由于多年经验积累下的自我批评，他们一直在阻止自己编写简单的实验性项目。他们提倡给予自己宽容和许可，自由地编写代码，而没有追求完美的压力。他们认为，尝试新的运行时、语言和想法是专业和个人成长的一种有价值的方式。核心信息是优先考虑编码的乐趣，鼓励读者探索、破坏和培养他们的好奇心，而不要过度批评结果。他们强调，所有代码，无论其感知的复杂性或目的如何，都有助于学习和成长。

title: Show HN: Swapple, a little daily puzzle on linear reversible circuit synthesis
summary: This "Show HN" post introduces Swapple, a daily puzzle game focused on linear reversible circuit synthesis. The core gameplay likely involves manipulating or constructing these circuits. However, the post reveals a critical issue: the Swapple website or application requires JavaScript to function correctly. The message "We're sorry but swapple doesn't work properly without JavaScript enabled. Please enable it to continue." indicates that the user cannot access or play the game without enabling JavaScript in their web browser. This limitation might deter users who have JavaScript disabled for security or privacy reasons or who are using browsers or environments where JavaScript isn't available. The post lacks details about the game's mechanics, difficulty, target audience, or any features beyond the basic concept of linear reversible circuit synthesis. Essentially, the post is more of a bug report or a notification that the game is currently inaccessible without JavaScript enabled than a comprehensive introduction to the game itself.
chinese_title: 展示一下：Swapple，一个关于线性可逆电路合成的每日小谜题
chinese_summary: 这个“Show HN”帖子介绍了一个名为Swapple的每日谜题游戏，它专注于线性可逆电路合成。核心玩法可能涉及操纵或构建这些电路。然而，该帖子揭示了一个关键问题：Swapple网站或应用程序需要JavaScript才能正常运行。“抱歉，没有启用JavaScript，Swapple无法正常工作。请启用它以继续。”这条消息表明，用户必须在其Web浏览器中启用JavaScript才能访问或玩游戏。这种限制可能会阻止那些因安全或隐私原因禁用JavaScript的用户，或者使用JavaScript不可用的浏览器或环境的用户。该帖子缺乏有关游戏机制、难度、目标受众或线性可逆电路合成基本概念之外的任何功能的详细信息。本质上，这个帖子更像是一个错误报告或通知，说明在没有启用JavaScript的情况下，目前无法访问该游戏，而不是对游戏本身的全面介绍。

title: The Long Trip from Silica to Smartphone
summary:
This article, "The Long Trip from Silica to Smartphone," traces the global journey of a smartphone processor, starting as a humble quartz rock and ending inside a finished iPhone. The journey spans three continents and involves highly complex and technologically advanced processes.

The process begins in Spain, where quartz is mined at Mina Serrabal. This quartz is then transported to a factory where it's mixed with wood chips and heated to extreme temperatures to produce silicon metal. This silicon metal, still impure, is sent to Germany for purification using the Siemens process, resulting in ultrapure polysilicon.

Next, the polysilicon may travel to Texas, where it's melted and formed into single-crystal silicon ingots using the Czochralski method. These ingots are then sliced into thin silicon wafers. These wafers are then shipped to Taiwan, where TSMC's Fab 18 uses advanced manufacturing techniques, including EUV lithography, to etch transistors and wiring onto them, creating the processor chips.

The individual chips are then sent to Malaysia for packaging, providing protection, heat dissipation, and connection points to circuit boards. Finally, the packaged chip arrives in India at a Foxconn assembly plant, where it's integrated with other components to create a complete iPhone. The article highlights the intricate global trade and the massive scale of the electronics industry, showing how a simple rock undergoes a remarkable transformation into a crucial component of modern technology.
chinese_title: 从硅到智能手机的漫长旅程
chinese_summary:
本文《从硅石到智能手机的漫长旅程》追溯了智能手机处理器的全球之旅，从不起眼的石英岩开始，到最终装入成品的iPhone。这段旅程横跨三大洲，涉及高度复杂和技术先进的流程。

该过程始于西班牙的塞拉巴尔矿，在那里开采石英。然后将石英运送到工厂，在那里与木屑混合并加热到极端温度以生产金属硅。这种仍然不纯的金属硅被送到德国，使用西门子工艺进行提纯，从而产生超纯多晶硅。

接下来，多晶硅可能会运到德克萨斯州，在那里将其熔化，并使用切克劳斯基法形成单晶硅锭。然后将这些硅锭切成薄的硅晶圆。这些晶圆随后被运往台湾，在那里，台积电的Fab 18工厂使用先进的制造技术，包括EUV光刻，将晶体管和布线蚀刻到晶圆上，从而制造出处理器芯片。

各个芯片随后被运往马来西亚进行封装，以提供保护、散热以及与电路板的连接点。最后，封装好的芯片抵达印度富士康组装厂，在那里与其他组件集成，制造出完整的iPhone。本文重点介绍了错综复杂的全球贸易和电子工业的巨大规模，展示了一块简单的岩石如何经过非凡的转变，成为现代技术中的关键组件。

title: Eliminating Cold Starts 2: shard and conquer
summary:
This article discusses Cloudflare's updated strategy for eliminating cold starts in its Workers platform. Previously, they pre-warmed Workers during TLS handshakes, but as Workers became more complex and TLS handshakes faster, this technique became less effective.

The new approach, called "Worker sharding," leverages a consistent hash ring to route requests to existing Worker instances across Cloudflare's global network, reducing the overall number of cold starts. Instead of each server having its own isolated set of Workers, the consistent hash ring allows them to act as shards of a larger, logical system, promoting reuse of existing instances.

The article addresses the challenge of overload by implementing a system where a shard server can refuse requests. They opted for an optimistic approach, sending requests first and allowing the server to redirect if necessary, avoiding a latency-inducing "ask for permission" roundtrip. This redirection is efficiently handled using Cap’n Proto RPC, which allows the shard server to return a handle to a lazily-loaded local instance of the Worker on the shard client, initiating a local cold start.
chinese_title: 消除冷启动 2：分片与征服
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了 Cloudflare 为消除其 Workers 平台冷启动而更新的策略。 之前，他们会在 TLS 握手期间预热 Workers，但随着 Workers 变得更加复杂且 TLS 握手速度加快，这种技术变得越来越无效。

新的方法称为“Worker 分片”，利用一致性哈希环将请求路由到 Cloudflare 全球网络中现有的 Worker 实例，从而减少冷启动的总数。一致性哈希环不是让每个服务器拥有自己孤立的 Workers 集，而是允许它们充当更大、逻辑系统的分片，从而促进现有实例的重用。

本文还解决了过载的挑战，通过实施一个允许分片服务器拒绝请求的系统。 他们选择了一种乐观的方法，首先发送请求，如果必要，允许服务器重定向，避免了导致延迟的“请求许可”往返。 这种重定向使用 Cap’n Proto RPC 有效地处理，这允许分片服务器在分片客户端上返回一个指向 Worker 的延迟加载的本地实例的句柄，从而启动本地冷启动。

title: Fernflower Java Decompiler
summary:
Fernflower is a Java decompiler that converts Java bytecode back into readable Java source code. It's designed to be an analytical decompiler, aiming for accuracy and functionality. Originally created by Stiver, it includes contributions from ForgeFlower. JetBrains now maintains the project, and the decompiler is integrated into IntelliJ IDEA.

To use Fernflower, you can either utilize the built-in IntelliJ IDEA plugin by opening `.class` files or run it from the command line. The command-line usage involves specifying source files (including class, zip, and jar files) and a destination directory. It can also handle library files that won't be decompiled but are considered for analysis.

Fernflower offers several command-line options to customize the decompilation process. These options control aspects like hiding bridge methods and synthetic members, decompiling inner classes, handling assertions and generics, renaming obfuscated identifiers, and more. The `-ren` option enables renaming, and users can implement a custom renaming strategy by providing a class that implements the `IIdentifierRenamer` interface via the `-urc` option.

For developers interested in contributing, the document provides instructions on building an executable startup script using Gradle. Fernflower is licensed under the Apache License Version 2.0.
chinese_title: Fernflower Java 反编译器
chinese_summary:
Fernflower 是一个 Java 反编译器，可以将 Java 字节码转换回可读的 Java 源代码。它被设计成一个分析型反编译器，旨在保证准确性和功能性。最初由 Stiver 创建，并包含了 ForgeFlower 的贡献。 JetBrains 现在负责维护该项目，并且该反编译器已集成到 IntelliJ IDEA 中。

要使用 Fernflower，你可以通过打开 `.class` 文件来利用 IntelliJ IDEA 内置的插件，或者从命令行运行它。 命令行用法涉及指定源文件（包括 class、zip 和 jar 文件）以及目标目录。它还可以处理不会被反编译但会用于分析的库文件。

Fernflower 提供了几个命令行选项来定制反编译过程。这些选项控制着诸如隐藏桥接方法和合成成员、反编译内部类、处理断言和泛型、重命名混淆标识符等方面的功能。`-ren` 选项启用重命名，用户可以通过 `-urc` 选项提供一个实现了 `IIdentifierRenamer` 接口的类来实现自定义的重命名策略。

对于有兴趣贡献的开发者，该文档提供了关于使用 Gradle 构建可执行启动脚本的说明。Fernflower 在 Apache License Version 2.0 许可下发布。

title: Tuning async IO in PostgreSQL 18
summary:
This blog post by Tomas Vondra offers advice on tuning asynchronous I/O (AIO) in PostgreSQL 18, a significant architectural change that aims to improve storage utilization. The author focuses on the `io_method` and `io_workers` parameters, explaining the trade-offs between the available AIO methods: `sync`, `worker`, and `io_uring`.

The recommended default is `io_method = worker`, which uses a pool of I/O workers. While `io_uring` offers potential efficiency, it's Linux-specific and subject to limitations. The author suggests avoiding `sync` unless backward compatibility with PostgreSQL 17 is crucial.

Crucially, the post highlights the importance of tuning `io_workers`. The default value of 3 is considered too low for most database servers with significant resources. The author recommends increasing `io_workers` to around 25% of the total number of cores, potentially even up to 100% in extreme cases.

The post explores the trade-offs of each method. While `io_uring` offloads work to the backend, `worker` distributes the load among multiple processes. `Worker` can outperform `io_uring` in certain scenarios (like sequential scans) because of its ability to parallelize checksum verification and memory copying. However, `worker` introduces inter-process communication overhead through signals, which can become a bottleneck in worst-case scenarios. Finally, `io_uring` can run into file descriptor limits, requiring adjustment of `ulimit -n`.

The author encourages readers to experiment with these settings and share their findings on the pgsql-hackers mailing list to contribute to official documentation in the future.
chinese_title: PostgreSQL 18 中异步 IO 调优
chinese_summary:
Tomas Vondra的这篇博客文章提供了关于调整PostgreSQL 18中异步I/O (AIO) 的建议，这是一个旨在提高存储利用率的重大架构变更。作者重点关注`io_method`和`io_workers`参数，解释了可用AIO方法之间的权衡：`sync`、`worker`和`io_uring`。

推荐的默认设置是`io_method = worker`，它使用一个I/O工作进程池。虽然`io_uring`具有潜在的效率，但它是Linux特有的并且受到限制。作者建议避免使用`sync`，除非与PostgreSQL 17的向后兼容性至关重要。

至关重要的是，这篇文章强调了调整`io_workers`的重要性。对于大多数具有重要资源的数据库服务器来说，默认值3被认为太低。作者建议将`io_workers`增加到总核心数的25%左右，在极端情况下甚至可能高达100%。

这篇文章探讨了每种方法的权衡。虽然`io_uring`将工作卸载到后端，但`worker`将负载分配给多个进程。由于`Worker`能够并行化校验和验证和内存复制，因此在某些情况下（如顺序扫描）`Worker`的性能可以优于`io_uring`。然而，`worker`通过信号引入了进程间通信开销，这在最坏的情况下可能成为瓶颈。最后，`io_uring`可能会遇到文件描述符限制，需要调整`ulimit -n`。

作者鼓励读者尝试这些设置，并在pgsql-hackers邮件列表中分享他们的发现，以便将来为官方文档做出贡献。

title: Privacy Badger is a free browser extension made by EFF to stop spying
summary:
Privacy Badger is a free browser extension created by the Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) to automatically block third-party trackers that monitor your online activity across multiple websites. Unlike traditional ad blockers, Privacy Badger focuses on privacy, blocking ads only if they track you without your consent.

Privacy Badger works by observing the behavior of third-party domains embedded in webpages. If the same domain is found tracking you on three separate sites (through cookies, supercookies, or fingerprinting), Privacy Badger will block content from that domain. It also sends Global Privacy Control (GPC) and Do Not Track (DNT) signals to websites to communicate your desire not to be tracked or have your data shared or sold.

The extension uses a color-coded slider system (red, yellow, green) to indicate the level of blocking for each domain. Red signifies complete blocking, yellow indicates cookie blocking for necessary third-party domains, and green means no action.

Privacy Badger differs from other blocking extensions by its algorithmic approach. It determines what constitutes "tracking" and blocks domains based on their actions rather than relying on curated lists. The EFF aims to incentivize advertisers to adopt better privacy practices, and encourages domains to respect DNT signals by posting EFF's DNT policy.

Privacy Badger is available for Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Opera. It offers protection against third-party tracking, and includes additional features such as cookie blocking, click-to-activate placeholders for potentially useful tracker widgets, and removal of outgoing link click tracking on Facebook and Google.
chinese_title: 隐私獾是由 EFF 制作的免费浏览器扩展，旨在阻止监视行为。
chinese_summary:
Privacy Badger 是一款由电子前哨基金会 (EFF) 创建的免费浏览器扩展，可自动阻止跨多个网站监视您在线活动的第三方跟踪器。 与传统的广告拦截器不同，Privacy Badger 专注于隐私，仅当广告未经您同意跟踪您时才会拦截广告。

Privacy Badger 通过观察嵌入网页中的第三方域的行为来工作。 如果在三个不同的站点上发现同一域跟踪您（通过 cookie、超级 cookie 或指纹识别），Privacy Badger 将阻止来自该域的内容。 它还会向网站发送全球隐私控制 (GPC) 和请勿跟踪 (DNT) 信号，以表明您不希望被跟踪或共享或出售您的数据。

该扩展使用颜色编码的滑块系统（红色、黄色、绿色）来指示每个域的阻止级别。 红色表示完全阻止，黄色表示阻止必要第三方域的 cookie，绿色表示不采取任何操作。

Privacy Badger 与其他拦截扩展的不同之处在于其算法方法。 它确定什么是“跟踪”，并根据域的行为而不是依赖于精选列表来阻止域。 EFF 旨在激励广告商采取更好的隐私措施，并鼓励域通过发布 EFF 的 DNT 政策来尊重 DNT 信号。

Privacy Badger 适用于 Chrome、Firefox、Edge 和 Opera。 它提供针对第三方跟踪的保护，并包含其他功能，例如 cookie 阻止、用于潜在有用跟踪器小部件的点击激活占位符，以及删除 Facebook 和 Google 上的外发链接点击跟踪。

title: Primer on FedEx's Distribution Network (2024)
summary:
Here's a concise summary of the article "Primer on FedEx's Distribution Network (2024)" based on the provided URL:

The article provides a high-level overview of FedEx's complex distribution network, highlighting its key components and strategies. It emphasizes that FedEx operates primarily as a hub-and-spoke system, utilizing large central hubs (like Memphis) to sort and redistribute packages. The network is divided into different operating companies (OpCos) – FedEx Express, FedEx Ground, FedEx Freight, and FedEx Services – each with distinct operational characteristics and service offerings.

FedEx Express focuses on time-sensitive deliveries and utilizes its own air fleet and extensive infrastructure. FedEx Ground, on the other hand, relies heavily on independent contractors, offering a more cost-effective solution for less urgent shipments. FedEx Freight handles less-than-truckload (LTL) shipments. FedEx Services provides sales, marketing, IT, and other back-office functions.

The article underscores the challenges FedEx faces in optimizing its network due to its siloed structure and the lack of integration between its different OpCos. While the DRIVE program is discussed as an effort to improve efficiency and reduce costs through network consolidation, the author implies that true integration will require overcoming entrenched operational and cultural barriers. The piece stresses the importance of understanding these network complexities when analyzing FedEx's performance and future prospects, particularly concerning capacity utilization and cost management. It also briefly touches on the impact of e-commerce growth and the increasing demand for faster, more reliable deliveries on FedEx's network.
chinese_title: 联邦快递分销网络入门 (2024)
chinese_summary:
以下是基于所提供URL的文章《联邦快递配送网络入门（2024）》的简要总结：

该文章对联邦快递复杂的配送网络进行了高层次概述，重点介绍了其关键组成部分和战略。文章强调联邦快递主要以枢纽辐射系统运作，利用大型中心枢纽（如孟菲斯）来分拣和重新分配包裹。该网络划分为不同的运营公司（OpCos）——联邦快递快递、联邦快递陆运、联邦快递货运和联邦快递服务——每家公司都具有独特的运营特点和服务。

联邦快递快递专注于对时效性要求高的交付，并利用其自身的机队和广泛的基础设施。另一方面，联邦快递陆运主要依靠独立承包商，为不太紧急的货物提供更具成本效益的解决方案。联邦快递货运处理零担货运（LTL）。联邦快递服务提供销售、营销、IT和其他后台职能。

文章强调了联邦快递由于其孤岛结构以及不同运营公司之间缺乏整合而面临的优化网络挑战。虽然文章讨论了 DRIVE 计划作为通过网络整合提高效率和降低成本的努力，但作者暗示，真正的整合将需要克服根深蒂固的运营和文化障碍。文章强调了在分析联邦快递的业绩和未来前景时，特别是在产能利用率和成本管理方面，理解这些网络复杂性的重要性。文章还简要提及了电子商务增长以及对更快、更可靠的交付日益增长的需求对联邦快递网络的影响。

title: Lockless MPSC/SPMC/MPMC queues are not queues
summary:
This article argues that only Single-Producer Single-Consumer (SPSC) queues are true queues, due to the ordering guarantees they provide. SPMC (Single-Producer Multi-Consumer) and MPMC (Multi-Producer Multi-Consumer) lockless queues don't enforce a total global order of message processing, leading to acausality where consumers might process later elements before earlier ones. While MPSC (Multi-Producer Single-Consumer) queues aren't queues in the same sense, they can be viewed as a multiplexer of individual producer queues, each maintaining its own order.

The author then critiques the traditional lockless queue implementation using circular buffers, highlighting the inherent linearization cost without actual ordering benefits for SPMC/MPMC. These implementations, despite being "lockless", suffer from contention as producers and consumers block each other when writing or reading values.

As an alternative, the author proposes "Lockness Bags" – a lockless MPMC channel based on an array and two bitvectors for reservations and commitments. While theoretically wait-free, Lockness Bags currently underperform queue-based approaches due to contention on the bitvectors, where producers and consumers always compete for the same cache lines.

The article concludes by discussing alternative approaches like using stacks, multiple SPSC queues, tunnel channels, and limiting channel elements to machine-word sizes, explaining their pitfalls and why they were ultimately rejected. The author hints at future hardware acceleration possibilities to improve the performance of Lockness Bags.
chinese_title: 无锁 MPSC/SPMC/MPMC 队列并非队列
chinese_summary:
本文认为，只有单生产者单消费者（SPSC）队列才是真正的队列，因为它们提供了排序保证。单生产者多消费者（SPMC）和多生产者多消费者（MPMC）无锁队列并不强制消息处理的全局总序，从而导致反因果关系，消费者可能先处理后面的元素，再处理前面的元素。虽然多生产者单消费者（MPSC）队列并非相同意义上的队列，但可以将它们视为各个生产者队列的多路复用器，每个队列都保持自身的顺序。

作者随后批判了使用循环缓冲区的传统无锁队列实现，强调了SPMC/MPMC在没有实际排序优势的情况下固有的线性化成本。这些实现虽然是“无锁”的，但由于生产者和消费者在写入或读取值时相互阻塞，因此会受到竞争的影响。

作为一种替代方案，作者提出了“Lockness Bags”——一种基于数组和两个位向量（用于预留和提交）的无锁MPMC通道。虽然理论上是无等待的，但由于位向量上的竞争，Lockness Bags目前的性能不如基于队列的方法，生产者和消费者总是争夺相同的缓存行。

文章最后讨论了其他方法，例如使用堆栈、多个SPSC队列、隧道通道以及将通道元素限制为机器字大小，并解释了它们的缺陷以及最终被拒绝的原因。作者暗示了未来通过硬件加速来提高Lockness Bags性能的可能性。

title: Patagonian Welsh
summary:
Patagonian Welsh (Cymraeg y Wladfa) is a dialect of the Welsh language spoken in the Welsh settlements (Y Wladfa) of Chubut Province, Argentina. Despite being distinct from dialects in Wales, it maintains high mutual intelligibility, allowing speakers from both regions to communicate effectively. Numerous place names in the Chubut Valley are Welsh in origin.

Efforts are made to preserve and promote the language, with teachers sent from Wales to train local tutors. Welsh education is funded by the Welsh Government, British Council, Cardiff University, and the Welsh-Argentine Association. In 2023-24, over 970 students were registered in Welsh language programs. The formal Eisteddfod poetry competitions have been revived and are bilingual in Welsh and Spanish.

Welsh classes are taught in Chubut, and the language is part of the curriculum in several schools. The Wales-Argentina Association runs a program to increase Welsh language use, leading to the creation of new Welsh speakers. The association also organizes teacher and student exchange trips.

Literature and journalism have been published in Welsh since the early years of the colony, including the bilingual newspaper Y Drafod. The dialect includes loanwords from Spanish and English. The article also lists numerous Patagonian place names of Welsh origin and their meanings, highlighting the cultural impact of the Welsh settlement.
chinese_title: 巴塔哥尼亚威尔士语
chinese_summary:
巴塔哥尼亚威尔士语（Cymraeg y Wladfa）是威尔士语的一种方言，在阿根廷丘布特省的威尔士人聚居地（Y Wladfa）中使用。尽管与威尔士本土的方言有所不同，但它保持着高度的互通性，使得两个地区的说话者能够有效地交流。丘布特山谷中许多地名都源自威尔士语。

人们正在努力保护和推广这种语言，威尔士会派遣教师来培训当地的导师。威尔士语教育由威尔士政府、英国文化协会、卡迪夫大学和威尔士-阿根廷协会资助。在2023-24年度，超过970名学生注册了威尔士语课程。正式的Eisteddfod诗歌比赛已经恢复，并且使用威尔士语和西班牙语双语进行。

威尔士语课程在丘布特省教授，该语言也是几所学校课程的一部分。威尔士-阿根廷协会运营一个项目以增加威尔士语的使用，从而培养新的威尔士语使用者。该协会还组织教师和学生的交流旅行。

自殖民地早期以来，威尔士语就一直有文学和新闻作品发表，包括双语报纸《Y Drafod》。该方言包括来自西班牙语和英语的借词。文章还列出了许多源自威尔士语的巴塔哥尼亚地名及其含义，突出了威尔士人定居点对文化的影响。

title: Cleaning house in Nx monorepo, how i removed unused deps safely
summary:
This article details a process for cleaning up unused dependencies in a large Nx monorepo using the Knip tool. The author successfully removed approximately 120 packages, resulting in a faster `yarn install` time and reduced security alerts.

The process involved:

1.  **Initial Scan:** Running Knip to identify potentially unused dependencies.
2.  **Verification Loop:** For each flagged dependency, the author:
    *   Uninstalled the package.
    *   Ran build, test, lint, e2e, and codegen/typegen commands.
    *   Booted the owning application to check for errors.
    *   If anything broke, the package was reinstalled and added to a Knip ignore list with a comment explaining why.
3.  **Configuration:** Configuring Knip to be monorepo-aware and adding necessary ignores for specific tools and patterns in the project (e.g., Jest config, CLI tools in scripts).
4.  **Deployment and Monitoring:** Deploying the changes to a preview environment to monitor for errors and then merging during a quiet time with active log monitoring after.

The author emphasizes that Knip's suggestions should be treated as hints, requiring human verification to avoid false positives. Knip excelled at identifying unused dependencies in common React and server app entry points but struggled with indirect usages, such as those in scripts or CI. The article concludes by suggesting integrating Knip into CI as a reporting tool to prevent future bloat.
chinese_title: 清理 Nx Monorepo 中的无用依赖，我是如何安全移除它们的
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了一种使用 Knip 工具清理大型 Nx monorepo 中未使用的依赖项的流程。作者成功移除了大约 120 个软件包，从而缩短了 `yarn install` 时间并减少了安全警报。

该流程包括：

1.  **初始扫描：** 运行 Knip 以识别潜在的未使用依赖项。
2.  **验证循环：** 对于每个标记的依赖项，作者：
    *   卸载软件包。
    *   运行 build、test、lint、e2e 和 codegen/typegen 命令。
    *   启动所属应用程序以检查错误。
    *   如果出现任何问题，则重新安装该软件包，并将其添加到 Knip 忽略列表，并附带解释原因的注释。
3.  **配置：** 配置 Knip 以感知 monorepo，并为项目中的特定工具和模式添加必要的忽略（例如，Jest 配置、脚本中的 CLI 工具）。
4.  **部署和监控：** 将更改部署到预览环境以监控错误，然后在平静时段合并，并在之后进行主动日志监控。

作者强调，Knip 的建议应被视为提示，需要人工验证以避免误报。Knip 擅长识别常见 React 和服务器应用程序入口点中未使用的依赖项，但对于间接使用（例如，脚本或 CI 中的使用）则效果不佳。文章最后建议将 Knip 集成到 CI 中作为报告工具，以防止未来膨胀。

title: The AI coding trap
summary:
The article "The AI Coding Trap" argues that while AI coding agents like Claude Code can generate code incredibly fast, they don't necessarily translate into significant productivity gains for complex software development. This is because AI excels at the "coding" part, but struggles with the crucial problem-solving, context understanding, and integration required in real-world projects. The article highlights that much time is spent understanding and fixing AI-generated code, negating the initial speed advantage.

The author draws a parallel between this situation and "The Tech Lead's Dilemma," where experienced engineers face the choice of delegating effectively for team growth versus doing all the hard work themselves for faster delivery. Just as mollycoddling juniors leads to brittle teams and burnout, relying solely on AI-generated code without human oversight creates unsustainable, messy codebases.

The solution, the article proposes, lies in treating LLMs as "lightning-fast junior engineers" and applying established software development best practices. This includes incorporating AI into every stage of the software development lifecycle, focusing on: specification, documentation, modular design, test-driven development, coding standards, and monitoring. By using AI as a tool within a structured framework, rather than as a complete replacement for human thinking, teams can avoid the "AI coding trap" and unlock the true potential of AI to accelerate the delivery of complex, scalable software.
chinese_title: 人工智能编码陷阱
chinese_summary:
文章《人工智能编码陷阱》认为，虽然像Claude Code这样的人工智能编码代理可以非常快速地生成代码，但它们并不一定能转化为复杂软件开发中显著的生产力提升。这是因为人工智能擅长“编码”部分，但在实际项目中所需的关键问题解决、上下文理解和集成方面表现不足。文章强调，人们需要花费大量时间理解和修复人工智能生成的代码，从而抵消了最初的速度优势。

作者将这种情况与“技术负责人的困境”相提并论，即经验丰富的工程师面临着为了团队成长而有效授权，还是为了更快交付而自己完成所有困难工作的选择。正如溺爱初级工程师会导致团队脆弱和倦怠一样，在没有人为监督的情况下仅仅依赖人工智能生成的代码会造成不可持续的、混乱的代码库。

文章提出，解决方案在于将大型语言模型视为“闪电般快速的初级工程师”，并应用已建立的软件开发最佳实践。这包括将人工智能融入软件开发生命周期的每个阶段，重点关注：规范、文档、模块化设计、测试驱动开发、编码标准和监控。通过在结构化框架内将人工智能作为一种工具使用，而不是完全替代人类思考，团队可以避免“人工智能编码陷阱”，并释放人工智能加速复杂、可扩展软件交付的真正潜力。
