summary:
In his blog post "90%", Armin Ronacher discusses his experience using AI to write a significant portion of the code for a new infrastructure component at his company. Inspired by Dario Amodei's prediction about AI's role in coding, Ronacher reports that over 90% of the 40,000 lines of code (Go, YAML, Pulumi, and custom SDK glue) were AI-generated.

Ronacher emphasizes that while some startups may be nearing 100% AI code generation, he treats every line as his own responsibility, maintaining high standards for architecture, code layout, and database interaction. He initially uses AI as a rubber duck for system design but doesn't let it take over entirely. He describes a stack involving raw SQL (generated by AI), OpenAPI-first approach for API design, and leveraging Claude Code and Codex for code generation and review.

He highlights the importance of careful oversight, as AI can create inefficient code, unnecessary abstractions, and inappropriate dependencies. It struggles with threading and error handling, often favoring conventional but potentially flawed practices.

Despite these challenges, Ronacher finds AI invaluable. It accelerates research, allows for rapid experimentation with different implementations, facilitates constant refactoring, simplifies infrastructure tasks, and even recommends useful testing patterns. He emphasizes the AI's ability to generate solid SQL as a major benefit.

Ronacher concludes that while AI may not completely replace human developers, it's already transforming how software is built. He stresses that being a good engineer is still crucial to prevent brittle systems and ensure responsible AI-assisted development. The key is judgment and oversight, not blind acceptance.
chinese_summary:
在他的博文中“90%”，Armin Ronacher 探讨了他使用 AI 为公司新的基础设施组件编写大部分代码的经验。受到 Dario Amodei 关于 AI 在编码中作用的预测的启发，Ronacher 报告说，超过 90% 的 40,000 行代码（Go、YAML、Pulumi 和自定义 SDK 粘合代码）都是 AI 生成的。

Ronacher 强调，虽然一些初创公司可能正在接近 100% 的 AI 代码生成，但他将每一行代码都视为自己的责任，并保持对架构、代码布局和数据库交互的高标准。他最初将 AI 用作系统设计的橡皮鸭，但不让它完全接管。他描述了一个涉及原始 SQL（由 AI 生成）、API 设计的 OpenAPI 优先方法，以及利用 Claude Code 和 Codex 进行代码生成和审查的技术栈。

他强调了仔细监督的重要性，因为 AI 可能会创建低效的代码、不必要的抽象和不适当的依赖项。它在线程和错误处理方面表现不佳，通常倾向于传统的但可能存在缺陷的实践。

尽管存在这些挑战，Ronacher 发现 AI 非常宝贵。它加速了研究，允许快速试验不同的实现，促进持续重构，简化基础设施任务，甚至推荐有用的测试模式。他强调 AI 生成可靠 SQL 的能力是一项主要优势。

Ronacher 总结说，虽然 AI 可能不会完全取代人类开发人员，但它已经在改变软件的构建方式。他强调，成为一名优秀的工程师对于防止脆弱的系统并确保负责任的 AI 辅助开发仍然至关重要。关键在于判断和监督，而不是盲目接受。

title: EA Announces Agreement to be Acquired by PIF, Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners
summary:
EA Announces Agreement to be Acquired by PIF, Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners for $55 Billion

Electronic Arts (EA) has announced a definitive agreement to be acquired by a consortium comprised of the Public Investment Fund (PIF), Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners for $55 billion. Under the terms of the agreement, the consortium will acquire all outstanding shares of EA at a price of $180 per share in cash.

The transaction is expected to close by the end of Q1 2026, subject to customary closing conditions, including regulatory approvals. Once the deal closes, EA will become a private company.

According to the press release, this acquisition aims to accelerate EA's growth, expand its global reach, and deepen its investment in games, technology, and talent. The consortium brings significant expertise in gaming, technology, and global investment, positioning EA for continued success in the evolving interactive entertainment landscape. The companies involved are expected to bring complementary strengths and resources that will allow EA to better serve its players and partners.

The press release also highlights the EA's current portfolio of popular game franchises like EA SPORTS, Apex Legends, and The Sims, suggesting these titles will continue to be a focus under the new ownership.
chinese_title: EA 宣布达成协议，将被 PIF、Silver Lake 和 Affinity Partners 收购
chinese_summary:
EA宣布协议，将被PIF、银湖和Affinity Partners以550亿美元收购

电子艺界（EA）宣布已达成最终协议，将被由公共投资基金（PIF）、银湖和Affinity Partners组成的财团以550亿美元收购。根据协议条款，该财团将以每股180美元的现金价格收购EA所有已发行股份。

该交易预计将于2026年第一季度末完成，但须满足惯例成交条件，包括获得监管部门的批准。交易完成后，EA将成为一家私营公司。

根据新闻稿，此次收购旨在加速EA的增长，扩大其全球影响力，并深化其在游戏、技术和人才方面的投资。该财团在游戏、技术和全球投资方面拥有丰富的专业知识，这将使EA在不断发展的互动娱乐领域取得持续成功。预计参与公司将带来互补的优势和资源，使EA能够更好地服务于其玩家和合作伙伴。

新闻稿还强调了EA目前拥有的EA SPORTS、Apex Legends和The Sims等热门游戏系列，表明这些游戏将在新的所有权下继续成为重点。

title: Microsoft launches 'vibe working' in Excel and Word
summary:
Microsoft is launching "vibe working" features in Excel and Word, powered by AI, to simplify complex tasks and enhance productivity. Agent Mode, available in both applications, allows users to generate spreadsheets and documents using simple prompts. In Excel, Agent Mode breaks down complex tasks, leveraging OpenAI's GPT-5 model for automated macro-like execution, and boasts a 57.2% accuracy rate on SpreadsheetBench. In Word, Agent Mode transforms document creation into a conversational, "vibe writing" experience.

Alongside Agent Mode, Microsoft is introducing an Office Agent in Copilot chat, powered by Anthropic models, that can create PowerPoint presentations and Word documents from chat prompts. This Office Agent can conduct web-based research and provide live previews of slides during presentation creation.

Microsoft emphasizes the auditable, refreshable, and verifiable nature of these AI-generated outputs. While committed to OpenAI, Microsoft is also exploring Anthropic models for various applications, with the Office Agent leveraging Anthropic's API.

Agent Mode in Copilot for Excel and Word is available today in the Frontier program for Microsoft 365 Copilot customers or Microsoft 365 Personal / Family subscribers. Agent Model in Excel and Word is only available in the web versions at launch, with desktop support coming soon. Office Agent is also available today in the Frontier program for Microsoft 365 Copilot customers or Microsoft 365 Personal / Family subscribers in the US.
chinese_title: 微软在Excel和Word中推出“氛围工作”功能
chinese_summary:
微软在Excel和Word中推出由AI驱动的“氛围工作”功能，以简化复杂任务并提高生产力。Agent Mode（代理模式）同时在两款应用中上线，允许用户通过简单提示生成电子表格和文档。在Excel中，Agent Mode分解复杂任务，利用OpenAI的GPT-5模型进行类似宏的自动化执行，并在SpreadsheetBench上拥有57.2%的准确率。在Word中，Agent Mode将文档创建转变为对话式的“氛围写作”体验。

除了Agent Mode，微软还在Copilot聊天中引入了Office Agent（办公代理），该代理由Anthropic模型驱动，可以通过聊天提示创建PowerPoint演示文稿和Word文档。此Office Agent可以进行基于网络的调研，并在演示文稿创建过程中提供幻灯片的实时预览。

微软强调这些AI生成输出的可审核、可刷新和可验证性。在致力于OpenAI的同时，微软也在探索Anthropic模型在各种应用中的可能性，其中Office Agent就利用了Anthropic的API。

面向Microsoft 365 Copilot客户或Microsoft 365个人/家庭订阅者的Excel和Word的Copilot中的Agent Mode今天已在Frontier计划中提供。Excel和Word中的Agent Model仅在发布时提供Web版本，桌面支持即将推出。面向美国Microsoft 365 Copilot客户或Microsoft 365个人/家庭订阅者的Office Agent今天也已在Frontier计划中提供。

title: Farewell friends
summary:
This is a farewell message written by Jonathan Clements, personal finance writer and founder of HumbleDollar, anticipating his death from cancer. Addressed to his family, friends, and readers, he expresses gratitude for a life filled with love, experiences, and career opportunities.

He requests a stone tablet marking his grave with the inscription "Family • Readers • Words," symbolizing the core elements of his life. He invites loved ones and passersby to visit and share updates.

Clements recounts key life events, from his birth in London and move to the U.S., to his difficult boarding school experience and subsequent studies at Cambridge. He details his journalism career, starting at Forbes and then at the Wall Street Journal, where he wrote the "Getting Going" column championing index funds. He also touches on his athletic achievements, running marathons and shorter races.

He reflects on his personal life, including two failed marriages before finding happiness with his third wife, Elaine, shortly before his cancer diagnosis. He discusses his career transition from journalism to the financial industry, working at Citigroup and later founding HumbleDollar. He also highlights his enjoyable professional relationship with Peter Mallouk at Creative Planning.

Clements expresses gratitude for spending his adult life doing what he loved and being surrounded by loved ones, facing his final months with appreciation rather than sorrow. He notes the surprising media attention his illness generated and views it as a fitting end to a career dedicated to financial literacy and advocating for index funds.
chinese_title: 朋友们，再见
chinese_summary:
这是一封由个人理财作家、“HumbleDollar”创始人乔纳森·克莱门茨预感到自己因癌症去世而写的告别信。信中，他向家人、朋友和读者表达了对充满爱、经历和职业机会的一生的感激之情。

他希望自己的墓碑上刻着“家庭 • 读者 • 文字”，象征着他生命的核心要素。他邀请亲人和路人前来探望并分享近况。

克莱门茨回顾了自己的人生大事，从在伦敦出生并移居美国，到艰难的寄宿学校经历以及之后在剑桥大学的学习。他详细描述了自己的新闻职业生涯，从《福布斯》杂志开始，然后在《华尔街日报》撰写“Getting Going”专栏，提倡指数基金。他还提到了自己的运动成就，包括跑马拉松和更短的比赛。

他回顾了自己的个人生活，包括在与第三任妻子伊莱恩找到幸福之前经历的两段失败婚姻，而与伊莱恩的相遇就在他被诊断出癌症之前不久。他谈到了自己从新闻业到金融行业的职业转型，曾在花旗集团工作，后来创立了HumbleDollar。他还强调了与Creative Planning的彼得·马卢克之间愉快的职业关系。

克莱门茨对能够用成年时期做自己喜欢的事情，并被爱人包围而感到感激，以感激之情而非悲伤面对最后的几个月。他注意到自己的病情引发的令人惊讶的媒体关注，并将其视为自己致力于金融知识普及和倡导指数基金的职业生涯的完美结局。

title: When I say “alphabetical order”, I mean “alphabetical order”
summary:
The author details a frustrating experience with inconsistent alphabetical sorting of image files from a hiking trip with their father. Both used Android phones that named files with timestamps (IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss.jpg), expecting alphabetical order to reflect the correct date/time order.

However, Windows Explorer, Google Drive, KDE's Dolphin, and other file managers sorted the files incorrectly, grouping them by phone rather than chronologically. The author initially suspected unicode issues or a bug in the systems, but the `ls` command on Linux sorted them correctly.

The problem stemmed from the file managers employing a "natural sort" algorithm. Instead of a strict alphabetical comparison, these systems interpret numerical sequences within filenames as actual numbers. Because the author's phone added an underscore separator between the seconds and milliseconds in the file name (IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss_mmm.jpg) compared to the father's (IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmssmmm.jpg) the file managers, in effect, compared 6 digits for the milliseconds of the fathers phone to a smaller amount for the author's phone. This meant that files from the author's phone always came first, because the numerical sequences without the separator were considered to be much larger.

While the author found a setting in Dolphin to revert to true alphabetical sorting, the experience highlighted a frustrating trend of software prioritizing presumed user intent over explicit instructions, leading to unexpected and difficult-to-debug behavior. They lament the days when computers followed instructions literally.
chinese_title: 我说“字母顺序”的时候，我指的就是“字母顺序”。
chinese_summary:
作者详细描述了一次令人沮丧的经历：与父亲一起徒步旅行拍摄的照片文件，其字母排序不一致。两人都使用Android手机，并以时间戳（IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss.jpg）命名文件，期望字母顺序能反映正确的日期/时间顺序。

然而，Windows资源管理器、Google Drive、KDE的Dolphin和其他文件管理器对文件进行了错误的排序，按手机而非按时间顺序分组。作者最初怀疑是Unicode问题或系统中的错误，但Linux上的`ls`命令却能正确排序。

问题源于文件管理器采用了“自然排序”算法。这些系统并非严格按照字母顺序比较，而是将文件名中的数字序列解释为实际数字。由于作者的手机在文件名中的秒和毫秒之间添加了下划线分隔符（IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss_mmm.jpg），而父亲的手机则没有（IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmssmmm.jpg），导致文件管理器实际上是将父亲手机的6位毫秒数与作者手机的较小毫秒数进行比较。这意味着来自作者手机的文件总是排在前面，因为没有分隔符的数字序列被认为更大。

虽然作者在Dolphin中找到了恢复到真正字母排序的设置，但这次经历突显了一个令人沮丧的趋势：软件优先考虑推测的用户意图，而不是明确的指令，从而导致意外且难以调试的行为。他们怀念计算机严格遵循指令的时代。

title: Failing to Understand the Exponential, Again
summary:
This article argues that the exponential progress in AI capabilities is being underestimated, drawing parallels to the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic where exponential growth was ignored. It criticizes the common reaction of dismissing AI's potential due to current imperfections.

The author cites two studies to support the exponential progress claim: METR's research on AI's ability to complete long software engineering tasks, showing a doubling rate of around 7 months, and OpenAI's GDPval study, which measures AI performance in 44 occupations, demonstrating that the latest models are approaching human performance. The author notes that models like Claude Opus 4.1 are surpassing trends and even matching expert performance.

The author praises OpenAI for releasing data that showcases a competitor's model outperforming their own, emphasizing the importance of integrity in AI development.

Based on these trends, the author predicts significant advancements in AI by the end of 2026, including AI autonomously working for full days and matching human expert performance across many industries. By 2027, the author expects AI to frequently outperform human experts. The author cautions against relying on "expert" opinions and advocates for simple extrapolation of trends as a more reliable method of prediction. The author also highlights the underperformance of Grok 4 and Gemini 2.5 Pro despite their claimed state-of-the-art status. The article concludes by recommending Epoch AI's 2030 report and the AI 2027 project for a deeper understanding of the future impact of AI.
chinese_title: 再次未能理解指数增长
chinese_summary:
本文认为，人工智能能力的指数级进步被低估了，并将此与新冠疫情早期指数级增长被忽视的情况进行类比。文章批判了因目前的不完善而否定人工智能潜力的常见反应。

作者引用了两项研究来支持指数级进步的论点：METR关于人工智能完成长软件工程任务能力的研究，表明其能力大约每7个月翻一番；以及OpenAI的GDPval研究，该研究衡量了人工智能在44个职业中的表现，表明最新的模型正在接近人类的水平。作者指出，像Claude Opus 4.1这样的模型正在超越趋势，甚至可以与专家的表现相媲美。

作者赞扬OpenAI发布数据，展示了竞争对手的模型优于自己的模型，强调了人工智能开发中诚信的重要性。

基于这些趋势，作者预测到2026年底，人工智能将取得重大进展，包括人工智能可以自主工作一整天，并在许多行业中达到人类专家的水平。到2027年，作者预计人工智能将经常超越人类专家。作者警告不要依赖“专家”的意见，并提倡简单地推断趋势作为更可靠的预测方法。作者还强调了Grok 4和Gemini 2.5 Pro的性能低于预期，尽管它们声称是当今最先进的水平。文章最后推荐Epoch AI的2030报告和AI 2027项目，以便更深入地了解人工智能未来的影响。

title: Denmark bans civilian drones as it ramps up security ahead of EU summit
summary:
In preparation for hosting EU and European Political Community summits this week, Denmark has banned all civilian drone flights in its airspace until October 3rd. This decision follows recent drone sightings that disrupted operations at several Danish airports and military facilities. The Danish government has heightened security measures due to these incursions and NATO's increased vigilance in the Baltic Sea region.

To bolster Denmark's security capabilities, Sweden is providing technology to counter unmanned aircraft systems and has already sent radar systems. France is contributing a Fennec helicopter and a 35-person team specializing in anti-drone measures. Germany's air defense frigate, FSG Hamburg, has also arrived in Copenhagen to enhance airspace surveillance.

Danish authorities have observed a pattern in the drone sightings, noting that similar incidents led to shutdowns at Copenhagen Airport and near other airports across the country, including locations housing fighter jet fleets. Danish officials emphasize the importance of ensuring optimal working conditions for the armed forces and police responsible for security during the upcoming summits amidst a challenging security landscape.
chinese_title: 丹麦在欧盟峰会前加强安保，禁止民用无人机。
chinese_summary:
为筹备本周举行的欧盟和欧洲政治共同体峰会，丹麦已禁止所有民用无人机在其领空飞行，直至10月3日。此前，近期发生的无人机目击事件扰乱了多个丹麦机场和军事设施的运作。由于这些入侵事件以及北约在波罗的海地区日益提高的警惕性，丹麦政府已加强了安全措施。

为了加强丹麦的安全能力，瑞典正在提供反无人机系统技术，并已派遣雷达系统。法国正在贡献一架小狐直升机和一支由35人组成的、专门从事反无人机措施的团队。德国的防空护卫舰“汉堡号”也已抵达哥本哈根，以加强领空监视。

丹麦当局已经观察到无人机目击事件的模式，注意到类似的事件曾导致哥本哈根机场以及全国其他机场（包括战斗机舰队所在地）的关闭。丹麦官员强调，在充满挑战的安全环境下，确保武装部队和警察在即将举行的峰会期间能够获得最佳工作条件至关重要。

title: Myoelectric Stimulation Silent Subwoofer for Body-Sensory Acoustic Sensation
summary:
This IEEE Xplore webpage snippet promotes an article titled "Myoelectric Stimulation Silent Subwoofer for Body-Sensory Acoustic Sensation." The article likely explores a novel approach to delivering the experience of deep bass frequencies, traditionally perceived through auditory means, using myoelectric stimulation. This suggests the technology aims to directly stimulate muscles to create a body-sensory acoustic sensation, effectively acting as a "silent subwoofer."

The remaining content of the snippet provides navigational information for IEEE Xplore users, including account management options, help resources, and legal disclaimers. It highlights IEEE's mission as a non-profit organization dedicated to advancing technology for humanitarian benefit.

Essentially, the page advertises research into a system that uses muscle stimulation to convey the feeling of deep bass frequencies, potentially offering a new way for individuals to experience music or other audio content without relying on traditional sound production. The user interface elements surrounding the article title are standard website features for IEEE Xplore users.
chinese_title: 肌电刺激静音低音炮，营造体感声学体验
chinese_summary:
该IEEE Xplore网页片段推广一篇题为“肌电刺激无声低音炮实现身体感官声学体验”的文章。该文章可能探索了一种新颖的方法，利用肌电刺激传递通常通过听觉感知的低音频率体验。这表明该技术旨在直接刺激肌肉以产生身体感官声学感觉，有效地充当“无声低音炮”。

该片段的剩余内容为IEEE Xplore用户提供导航信息，包括帐户管理选项、帮助资源和法律声明。它强调了IEEE作为一家致力于为人类利益推进技术的非营利组织的使命。

本质上，该页面宣传了一项利用肌肉刺激来传达低音频率感觉的研究，可能为个人提供了一种无需依赖传统声音产生即可体验音乐或其他音频内容的新方法。文章标题周围的用户界面元素是IEEE Xplore用户的标准网站功能。

title: Translation and Taste
summary:
This article explores the relationship between translation, taste, and judgment, drawing on the work of Hannah Arendt and her student Michael Denneny. It argues that translation, like activities requiring "taste" (e.g., decorating, party planning), demonstrates the multiplicity of "goodness" and the difficulty of defining it definitively. "Taste," mediating contradictions, refers to both individual capacity and object quality, bridging objective value and personal whim.

Arendt viewed "judgment," distinct from thinking and willing, as crucial for political and ethical activity, especially when traditional authorities and logical rules are absent. She saw aesthetic choices as revealing the character of "goodness." Denneny, focusing on "taste," highlighted its historical significance in 17th-18th century aesthetic thought, linking it to pleasure, embodiment, and personal specificity, aspects often overlooked in post-Kantian judgment theories.

Denneny's work on early-modern thinkers like Baltasar Gracián and Dominique Bouhours emphasized the importance of exemplary individuals exercising taste and providing models for others. Bouhours' concept of *je ne sais quoi*—an indefinable quality that pleases us—underlines the idea that pleasure, though not based on strict rules, has a relation to reason. Cultivating good taste, according to Bouhours, involves translation and engaging with classical authors to refine one's understanding of goodness and beauty. The example of translating Lucan's "Victrix causa deis placuit, sed victa Catoni" illustrates the challenges and nuances inherent in translating not just words, but also cultural and ethical contexts.
chinese_title: 翻译与品味
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了翻译、品味和判断之间的关系，借鉴了汉娜·阿伦特及其学生迈克尔·丹尼的工作。文章认为，翻译，如同需要“品味”的活动（如装饰、派对策划），展示了“好”的多样性以及对其进行明确定义的困难。“品味”调和着矛盾，既指个人能力又指对象质量，弥合了客观价值和个人喜好。

阿伦特认为，“判断”不同于思考和意愿，对于政治和伦理活动至关重要，尤其是在传统权威和逻辑规则缺失的情况下。她认为，审美选择揭示了“好”的本质。丹尼专注于“品味”，强调其在17-18世纪美学思想中的历史意义，将其与快乐、具身性和个人特殊性联系起来，而这些方面在后康德判断理论中经常被忽视。

丹尼对巴尔塔萨·格拉西安和多米尼克·布奥赫等早期现代思想家的研究，强调了行使品味并为他人提供榜样的典范人物的重要性。布奥赫的*je ne sais quoi*概念——一种让我们愉悦的难以定义的特质——突出了这样一种观点，即快乐虽然不是基于严格的规则，但与理性有关。布奥赫认为，培养良好的品味涉及翻译，并与古典作家交流，以提高人们对美好和美的理解。翻译卢坎的“Victrix causa deis placuit, sed victa Catoni”的例子说明了翻译的挑战和细微之处，不仅仅是翻译文字，还要翻译文化和伦理背景。

title: Buyers of Radio Shack, Pier 1 brands accused of running $112M Ponzi scheme
summary:
The SEC has accused e-commerce entrepreneurs Alex Mehr and Tai Lopez, founders of Retail Ecommerce Ventures (REV), of operating a $112 million Ponzi scheme. REV acquired distressed retail brands like RadioShack, Modell's Sporting Goods, and Pier 1 Imports, promising investors high returns by transitioning them to online-only businesses.

The SEC alleges that between 2020 and 2022, Mehr and Lopez misled investors by claiming their portfolio companies were profitable and that funds raised for a specific brand would be used solely for that brand. However, the SEC claims none of the brands generated profits, and investor money was used to pay off previous investors and cover obligations, resembling a Ponzi scheme. At least $5.9 million was allegedly paid out as Ponzi-like payments.

Furthermore, Mehr and Lopez are accused of misallocating $16 million for personal use. REV's Chief Operating Officer, Maya Burkenroad (Lopez's cousin), is also implicated for aiding the alleged fraud. The SEC claims Burkenroad's experience was misrepresented, as she had previously worked as a preschool teacher, radio promoter, and Lopez's assistant, rather than having significant experience managing multi-million-dollar companies. Neither Mehr, Lopez, nor Burkenroad have commented on the allegations.
chinese_title: Radio Shack、Pier 1品牌收购方被指控运作1.12亿美元庞氏骗局
chinese_summary:
美国证券交易委员会指控电商企业家Alex Mehr和Tai Lopez（Retail Ecommerce Ventures (REV) 创始人）运营一项1.12亿美元的庞氏骗局。REV收购了RadioShack、Modell's Sporting Goods和Pier 1 Imports等陷入困境的零售品牌，承诺通过将其转型为纯线上业务，为投资者带来高回报。

美国证券交易委员会称，在2020年至2022年期间，Mehr和Lopez谎称其投资组合公司盈利，并声称为特定品牌筹集的资金将仅用于该品牌，从而误导了投资者。然而，美国证券交易委员会声称，这些品牌均未产生利润，而投资者的资金被用于偿还之前的投资者和支付义务，类似于庞氏骗局。据称，至少有590万美元以类似庞氏骗局的方式支付。

此外，Mehr和Lopez还被指控挪用1600万美元供个人使用。REV首席运营官Maya Burkenroad（Lopez的表妹）也因协助涉嫌欺诈而被牵连。美国证券交易委员会声称，Burkenroad的经验被歪曲，因为她之前曾担任幼儿园教师、电台推广员和Lopez的助理，而不是拥有管理数百万美元公司的丰富经验。Mehr、Lopez和Burkenroad均未对这些指控发表评论。

title: Corral.BAS
summary:
Corral.BAS is a simple text-based game originally featured in David Ahl's "More BASIC Computer Games" and later refactored by Michael Coorlim. The player, a cowboy, attempts to catch a horse within a corral.

The game unfolds in turns, where the player inputs a number between 1 and 5, representing the number of steps taken towards the horse. Strategic movement is crucial. Moving more than half the distance to the horse at once causes it to bolt away. Also, approaching too closely can result in the horse kicking the player, potentially leading to hospitalization and game over.

The game displays the corral as a text-based field, showing the cowboy's and horse's positions using characters 'C' and 'H' respectively, and rail lines using the character 'I'. The game tracks the number of turns taken.

The horse's movement is determined randomly using DATA values, simulating realistic behavior. The "HORSE_CLAMP" subroutine ensures the horse stays within the corral boundaries. The game ends when the cowboy catches the horse, the player is hospitalized from kicks or if the horse escapes after 100 turns. Upon conclusion, the player is offered the option to play again.
chinese_title:
Corral.BAS
卡罗尔.BAS
chinese_summary:
Corral.BAS 是一款简单的文字游戏，最初由 David Ahl 在他的 "More BASIC Computer Games" 中推出，后来由 Michael Coorlim 重构。玩家扮演一名牛仔，试图在一个畜栏里抓住一匹马。

游戏以回合制进行，玩家输入一个介于 1 到 5 之间的数字，代表向马移动的步数。战略性移动至关重要。一次移动超过到马距离的一半会导致马逃跑。此外，过于接近可能会导致马踢玩家，可能导致住院并游戏结束。

游戏以文本形式显示畜栏，使用字符 'C' 和 'H' 分别显示牛仔和马的位置，并使用字符 'I' 显示栏杆。游戏会记录所用的回合数。

马的移动由 DATA 值随机确定，模拟真实行为。“HORSE_CLAMP”子程序确保马停留在畜栏边界内。当牛仔抓住马，玩家因被踢住院或马在 100 回合后逃脱时，游戏结束。结束后，玩家可以选择再次游戏。

title: VMScape and why Xen dodged it
summary:
This article discusses VMScape, a recently discovered microarchitectural attack that allows malicious virtual machines (VMs) to leak data across VMs by exploiting incomplete branch predictor isolation in CPUs, specifically targeting AMD Zen 4 and Zen 5. The attack can leak QEMU userspace secrets.

The core of the article highlights why Xen hypervisor is not vulnerable to VMScape. Unlike KVM and VMware, which heavily rely on QEMU within the hypervisor, Xen's architecture was designed with a small core. Key functionalities like device emulation, storage, and networking are moved out to a separate, less privileged VM called Dom0. This design choice, akin to a microkernel, means that even if VMScape leaks information from QEMU, it's confined to Dom0, not the hypervisor itself.

The author emphasizes that Xen's small hypervisor core is easier to audit and secure, making it suitable for safety-critical applications. While acknowledging that Xen isn't immune to vulnerabilities, the article underscores that Xen's architectural design inherently provides a layer of defense in depth against attacks like VMScape. In contrast, KVM and VMware will require patching their systems to mitigate the vulnerability. The author concludes that security is multi-layered and that foundational architectural choices, like Xen's privilege separation, contribute significantly to overall resilience.
chinese_title: VMScape及其Xen规避它的原因
chinese_summary:
本文讨论了VMScape，一种最近发现的微架构攻击，它允许恶意虚拟机（VM）通过利用CPU中不完整的分支预测器隔离来跨VM泄漏数据，特别是针对AMD Zen 4和Zen 5。该攻击可以泄漏QEMU用户空间密钥。

文章的核心强调了Xen虚拟机管理程序为何不受VMScape攻击的影响。与在虚拟机管理程序中严重依赖QEMU的KVM和VMware不同，Xen的架构设计采用了一个小内核。设备仿真、存储和网络等关键功能被移至一个独立的、权限较低的VM，称为Dom0。这种类似于微内核的设计选择意味着，即使VMScape从QEMU泄漏信息，也仅限于Dom0，而不是虚拟机管理程序本身。

作者强调，Xen的小型虚拟机管理程序内核更易于审计和保护，使其适用于安全关键型应用。文章承认Xen并非对漏洞免疫，但强调Xen的架构设计本身提供了一层针对VMScape等攻击的纵深防御。相比之下，KVM和VMware将需要修补其系统以缓解该漏洞。作者总结说，安全是多层面的，而像Xen的特权分离这样的基础架构选择对整体弹性做出了重大贡献。

title: The elusive roots of rosin potatoes (2022)
summary:
Caroline Hatchett investigates the origins of rosin potatoes, a culinary curiosity from her hometown of Baxley, Georgia. These potatoes are cooked by submerging them in hot, molten rosin, a byproduct of turpentine production from pine trees. Hatchett's quest involves interviewing her father, turpentine workers, historians, chefs, and others to trace the dish's roots.

The article details the historical context of turpentine production in the American South, particularly its reliance on enslaved labor who harvested oleoresin (gum) from pine trees.  While rosin potatoes are widely believed to have originated in turpentine camps, Hatchett finds no definitive historical record of the dish being consumed by these workers or appearing on plantation menus.

She highlights the impracticality of cooking with rosin due to its flammability and noxious fumes, yet notes the dish's inclusion in classic cookbooks and even its presence on restaurant menus for a time.  Chef Sean Brock praises rosin potatoes for their intense potato flavor and unique texture, as the rosin traps the potato's essence during cooking.

Hatchett's research leads her to turpentine production facilities and historical reenactments, seeking evidence and anecdotes. While she finds no concrete origin story, she discovers that turpentine production significantly shaped the economy and culture of her hometown. The article concludes that the origin of rosin potatoes remains elusive, possibly invented later as a nostalgic celebration of the turpentine lifestyle.
chinese_title: 脂质马铃薯难以捉摸的根源 (2022)
chinese_summary:
卡罗琳·哈切特调查了松香土豆的起源，这是一种来自她家乡佐治亚州巴克斯利的独特美食。 这些土豆的烹饪方法是将它们浸入滚烫的熔融松香中，松香是松树生产松节油的副产品。 哈切特的探索包括采访她的父亲、松节油工人、历史学家、厨师和其他人，以追溯这道菜的根源。

文章详细介绍了美国南方松节油生产的历史背景，特别是其对奴隶劳工的依赖，他们从松树上采集油树脂（松脂）。 虽然人们普遍认为松香土豆起源于松节油营地，但哈切特没有找到任何确凿的历史记录表明这些工人食用过这道菜，或者它出现在种植园的菜单上。

她强调了用松香烹饪的不切实际性，因为它易燃且有毒烟雾，但她注意到这道菜被收录在经典食谱中，甚至一度出现在餐厅的菜单上。 厨师肖恩·布洛克称赞松香土豆具有浓郁的土豆风味和独特的口感，因为松香在烹饪过程中锁住了土豆的精华。

哈切特的调查研究将她带到松节油生产设施和历史重演现场，寻找证据和轶事。 虽然她没有找到具体的起源故事，但她发现松节油生产极大地影响了她家乡的经济和文化。 文章的结论是，松香土豆的起源仍然难以捉摸，可能是在后来被发明出来，作为对松节油生活方式的怀旧庆祝。
